name: courier_autodeliver
description: Toggle auto delivering of items.

name: ringmaster_spotlight
description: Ringmaster shines **3** spotlights that sweep over an area. Enemies in the light have a chance to miss their attacks and are revealed if invisible. Illusions hit by the beam fade away, losing a percentage of their maximum health each second. These effects linger for **0.3** seconds after leaving the light.
lore: Are you ready for your fifteen seconds? The limelight draws no distinction between infamy and fame.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Spotlight.

name: ringmaster_summon_unicycle
description:
# Use: Saddle Up
Summons a speedy unicycle to ride around on for **10** seconds. **1.5**s after mounting the unicycle, taking damage from enemy hero sources greater than **20** dismounts the rider. Crashing into trees destroys them and slows the unicycle. Attacking, using channeled abilities, or crashing into units and other obstacles also dismounts the rider.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AFFECTED_BY_MUTE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IS_FAKE_ITEM | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES

name: item_ring_of_aquila
description:
# Passive: Aquila Aura
Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration and %aura_bonus_armor% armor to nearby allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%

# Toggle: Aura
Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
note: Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.

name: item_trident
description: Combines Sange, Yasha and Kaya together.

name: ringmaster_weighted_pie
description:
# Use: Toss Pie
Knocks enemies back, slows them by **45%** and reduces their vision to **50** recovering over **3** seconds, and prevents them from receiving vision from their allies for the duration. Instantly kills any non-ancient creep.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AFFECTED_BY_MUTE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IS_FAKE_ITEM | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES

name: ringmaster_crystal_ball
description:
# Use: Clairvoyance
Scans a targeted **450** area with global range for **5** seconds. Indicates whether there are enemy heroes in that area for the duration. Reveals invisible units and wards in the scanned area, but does not provide vision. The reveal effect lingers for **1** second.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AFFECTED_BY_MUTE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IS_FAKE_ITEM | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES

name: roshan_grab_and_throw

ability_special.header: TARGET HP DAMAGE GROWTH PER MINUTE:

description: Heroes that get in Roshan's way while he's moving between pits will be violently thrown away. Upon landing, heroes take damage and become stunned for **1** second. Deals additional damage for each throw he's done within one cycle of moving between pits.
note: Heroes will be thrown away from Roshan based on their relative position to Roshan.

name: tiny_craggy_exterior
description: Enemies that attack Tiny receive a stacking debuff that lowers their attack damage with each stack.
note:
Break disables the application of new stacks.
Break does not disable the effects of existing stacks.

name: enchantress_bunny_hop
description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the **2** furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + **100**.
lore: Sproink is as Sproink does.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Sproink.

name: rattletrap_overclocking
description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in its range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased; Jetpack moves faster. Clockwerk's movement and attack speed becomes slowed to a crawl after the duration runs out.
lore: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Overclocking.

name: pudge_eject
description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.
lore: Allies emerge forever changed.

name: item_mango_tree
description:
# Use: Plant a Mango Tree
Targets the ground to plant a mango tree that provides unlimited mango power. The tree generates Enchanted Mangoes every %seconds% seconds, and provides unobstructed vision in the area .

name: meepo_megameepo_fling
description: In MegaMeepo form, Meepo flings the topmost meepo towards a target within a **900** range, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed.
lore: You go first!
note: Does not trigger spell reflect.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: MegaMeepo Fling.

name: lycan_wolf_bite
description: Lycan bites an allied hero or creep-hero, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain **40%** Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within **1200** range of each other.
lore: Does this bite look infected?
note: Wolf Bite cooldown matches the cooldown of the current level of Shapeshift.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Wolf Bite.

name: treant_natures_grasp
description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Does **35%** less damage to creeps.
lore: The tendrils of Rooftrellen's influence stretch to all corners of the forest.

name: drow_ranger_multishot
description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying Frost Arrows. Lasts up to **1.75** seconds.
lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.
note:
Arrow base damage pierces magic immunity.
Frost Arrows' damage and slow do not pierce magic immunity.

name: ringmaster_tame_the_beasts
description: CHANNELED - Ringmaster twirls his whip for up to **1** second then cracks it. Whipped enemies are damaged and flee in fear from Ringmaster. Channel time exponentially increases damage and extends the fear duration, but reduces the radius.
lore: From unhappy crowds to unruly acts, nothing persuades a pack of animals quite like the crack of the Ringmaster's whip.

name: ringmaster_tame_the_beasts_crack
description: *CRACK*

name: ringmaster_the_box
description: Ringmaster packs himself or an allied hero into a mobile, extradimensional box. Boxed units gain phased movement, slow resistance, bonus magic resistance, and bonus movement speed. They are also untargetable, muted, silenced, and disarmed. The box will pop open after the effect expires or it moves more than **500** units away.
lore: An adept assistant has nothing to fear within the confines of The Box. An amateur has...much darker prospects indeed.
scepter_description: Escape Act has %max_charges% charges. When the box pops open, Impalement Art daggers are thrown in all directions, and all enemies in an **225** radius take **300** damage.

name: ringmaster_wheel
description:
Ringmaster rolls the Wheel of Wonder to the targeted location, knocking aside enemies along the way. After it reaches its target, enemies in range of the wheel take damage over time and are slowed by **-50%**.

Enemy heroes who face the wheel for more than **0.5** seconds are mesmerized and drawn towards it. The first enemy to be mesmerized triggers a timer for the wheel to explode. If the timer is not triggered, it will automatically explode after **4** seconds.
lore: No, brave friends, illusions are for charlatans and card sharks. What you witness today is the power of true magic. But only if you dare set your gaze upon...the mesmerizing wheel.

name: ringmaster_impalement
description: Ringmaster throws one of his daggers to a precise point of his choosing. If he strikes an enemy, the dagger deals impact damage, briefly slows the unit hit, and causes them to bleed. The bleeding deals a percentage of the victim's maximum health in damage every second to heroes and flat damage per second to creeps.
lore: Passed down through generations, it simply wouldn't be a Kettle Circus without the Great Cogliostro's signature trick.

name: ringmaster_empty_souvenir
description: Gather souvenirs from kills and assists.

name: ringmaster_dark_carnival_souvenirs
description:
Ringmaster receives a random single-use Dark Carnival Souvenir whenever an enemy hero dies within **925** units of him. Additional Souvenirs are held as charges.

If Ringmaster does not have a Souvenir when he dies he will be granted one.

name: ringmaster_funhouse_mirror
description:
# Use: Proportion Distortion
Creates **1** imperfect image of your hero that lasts **18** seconds. Your illusion deals **28%** and takes  **300%** damage.
note: Has a **0.2** second cast time during which you are invulnerable.

name: ringmaster_whoopee_cushion
description:
# Use: Whoopsie
Propels your hero forward **400** units. Leaves a **200** radius stink cloud behind for **3** seconds that slows enemies by **-30%**.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AFFECTED_BY_MUTE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IS_FAKE_ITEM | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES

name: miniboss_radiance
description: Deals **60** damage to all units within **1000** range every second for **10**s once attacked or damaged.

name: ringmaster_strongman_tonic
description:
# Use: Forcefully Imbibe
Temporarily increases an allied hero's Strength by **5** plus **1** per Ringmaster's level for **8** seconds. The effect holds for **4** seconds and then deteriorates over the duration.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AFFECTED_BY_MUTE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IS_FAKE_ITEM | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES

name: special_bonus_unique_ringmaster_the_box_strong_dispel_and_flying
localized_name: Escape Act Grants Strong Dispel and Flying

name: juggernaut_swift_slash
description: Performs a short Omnislash for **1** seconds.
lore: A briefer onslaught for those less deserving of the honor.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Swiftslash.

name: terrorblade_terror_wave
description: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact and dealing damage, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.
lore: A shockwave of power strong enough to break the walls of Foulfell itself.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Terror Wave.

name: special_bonus_unique_sand_king_4
description: Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by **50%**.

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_5
localized_name: +%bonus_bonus_movement_speed_pct_night% Hunter In The Night Movement Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_5
localized_name: +15 Movespeed to Beastmaster and his summons
description: The Movespeed Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all his summons.

name: special_bonus_unique_lich_6
localized_name: +125 Frost Blast Radius and Area Damage

name: tinker_shrink_ray
scepter_description: Adds new ability: tinker_shrink_ray.

name: shadow_shaman_serpentine
scepter_description: Adds new ability: shadow_shaman_serpentine.

name: brewmaster_primal_split_cancel
description: Cancel the Primal Split.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Primal Split Cancel.

name: magnataur_greater_shockwave
scepter_description: Adds new ability: magnataur_greater_shockwave.

name: leshrac_greater_lightning_storm
description: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.
lore: When it serves his purpose, Leshrac briefly reduces his presence in the Terrene Plane.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Nihilism.

name: special_bonus_unique_lion_8
localized_name: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

name: antimage_mana_overload
scepter_description: Adds new ability: antimage_mana_overload.

name: meepo_petrify
description:
Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for **3**s. Restores **25%** of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: I'm diggin' here!
shard_description: Adds new ability: Dig.

name: riki_poison_dart
shard_description: Adds new ability: riki_poison_dart.

name: omniknight_angelic_flight
scepter_description: Adds new ability: omniknight_angelic_flight.

name: grimstroke_ink_over
shard_description: Adds new ability: grimstroke_ink_over.

name: dazzle_rain_of_vermin
scepter_description: Adds new ability: dazzle_rain_of_vermin.

name: windrunner_focusfire_cancel
description: End your Focus Fire early.

name: beastmaster_mark_of_the_beast
scepter_description: Adds new ability: beastmaster_mark_of_the_beast.

name: kunkka_tidal_wave
description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.
lore: A good sailor knows the timing of the tides like the back of his hand.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Tidal Wave.

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_6
localized_name: +250 Health to Beastmaster and his summons
description: The Max Health Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all his summons.

name: special_bonus_unique_clockwerk_6
description: Also provides 50% magic resistance while Debuff Immune.

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_12
description: Allows Ice Wall to be cast as a Vector Target ability with %bonus_vector_cast_range% cast range.

name: naga_siren_crit
scepter_description: Adds new ability: naga_siren_crit.

name: special_bonus_unique_keeper_of_the_light_10
localized_name: +%bonus_stun_duration%s Solar Bind Stun when target is fully slowed

name: furion_greater_sprout
scepter_description: Adds new ability: furion_greater_sprout.

name: special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_7
description: Bouncing attacks deal **65%** damage.

name: rattletrap_jetpack
description: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack can be toggled on and off for the duration of the buff.
lore: Sure it's blown up over fourteen testing dummies, but at least they all flew!
shard_description: Adds new ability: Jetpack.

name: life_stealer_ghoul_frenzy
description: Passively grants Lifestealer Movement and Attack Speed.
lore: Distant memories of the Vile Council fuel one mind to plotting and the other to more immediate dark ends.

name: witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo
description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Voodoo Switcheroo.

name: zuus_heavenly_jump
description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets **900** unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.
lore: Though temporarily barred from the heavens, Zeus can still manage a measure of godly flight.

name: alchemist_berserk_potion
description:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: After Razzil's great grandfather tested an early version of this potion on himself, a surviving family member immediately saw the profit potential.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Berserk Potion.

name: bristleback_hairball
description: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies with Viscous Nasal Goo stacks and Quill Spray.
lore: Every part of Bristleback's body is a weapon -- even the parts he accidentally swallowed.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Hairball.

name: rubick_telekinesis_land_self
description: Chooses the location you will land when Telekinesis finishes.

name: ogre_magi_smash
description: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next **3** attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.
lore: There is immense luck involved in Aggron not just setting friends on fire.
note: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an **1000** area of effect to receive Fire Shield.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fire Shield.

name: magnataur_horn_toss
description: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend **0.6** seconds in the air, and are stunned while in the air and an additional amount of time after landing.
lore: Survivors of Joerlak will never forget the sight of Magnus tossing countless enemies into rivers of fire and clouds of ash.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Horn Toss.

name: tinker_defense_matrix
description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.
lore: A gifted mind unconstrained by moral or ethical boundaries tends to attract an adversary or two.
note: Translocator will not blink Tinker forward if he is Rooted or Leashed after the Basic Dispel.

name: shredder_flamethrower
description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.
lore: A single saw can only cut so much. A single spark can burn forever.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Flamethrower.

name: windrunner_gale_force
description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Gale Force.

name: omniknight_hammer_of_purity
description: Omniknight imbues his hammer with holy power, causing his attack to have increased range, deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slow his target for a short duration.
lore: The knight is merely a means to move the hammer.

name: dragon_knight_fireball
description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
lore: Most Dragon Knights name no greater horror than the scourge of dragon's fire.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fireball.

name: necrolyte_death_seeker
description: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.
lore: The Rumusque Faithful consider Necrophos to be more plague than person.
note: Does not trigger spell reflect.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Death Seeker.

name: phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives
description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.
lore: A sister is generally given a single name, but powerful names often have plentiful allies.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Fan of Knives.

name: slark_fish_bait
shard_description: Adds new ability: slark_fish_bait.

name: special_bonus_unique_bane_7
localized_name: Brain Sap Pure and Pierces Immunity

name: storm_spirit_electric_rave
description: Grants Storm Spirit and allied heroes within **750** AoE of him **3** Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to **12** seconds or until the charges are depleted.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Electric Rave.

name: visage_silent_as_the_grave
description: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts **30** seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
lore: Those on the mortal plane are blind to the stirrings of the agents of the afterlife.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Silent as the Grave.

name: dark_seer_normal_punch
description: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past **3** seconds. Max power is reached after **1100** distance moved.
lore: As a young soldier, long before he became a leader of his people, Ish'Kafel was known amongst his fellow recruits as quite the pugilist.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Normal Punch.

name: sniper_concussive_grenade
description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.
lore: ATTN: IN CASE OF DANGER PULL PIN
shard_description: Adds new ability: Concussive Grenade.

name: terrorblade_demon_zeal
description: Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, providing Terrorblade and nearby illusions bonus movement, HP Regen and attack speed. Reflection illusions gain **50%** of the bonuses. Can't be cast while in Metamorphosis and Metamorphosis will remove Demon Zeal
lore: Fear is fueled by confusion when Terrorblade's enemies see that the first cut he makes is one to embolden himself.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Demon Zeal.

name: beastmaster_hawk_dive
description: Flies towards the target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it.

name: medusa_cold_blooded
description: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy that turns them into stone for **1**s.
lore: Point your gaze at her if you dare.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Cold Blooded.

name: special_bonus_unique_mirana_5
description: Evasion works at all times during the buff

name: special_bonus_unique_ringmaster_whip_debuff_immunity
localized_name: Debuff Immunity While Channeling Tame the Beasts
description: Also grants 50% magic resistance.

name: special_bonus_unique_queen_of_pain_5
description: Enemies damaged by Sonic Wave are forced to run away from Queen of Pain for %value% seconds.

name: slark_depth_shroud
description: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.
lore: Nothing worse than a job going bad thanks to some clompy-footed friend.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Depth Shroud.

name: special_bonus_unique_dragon_knight_8
localized_name: +%bonus_frost_breath_effect_bonus% Wyrm's Wrath effect during Elder Dragon Form

name: special_bonus_unique_kunkka_6
localized_name: +%bonus_ally_ms% X Marks the Spot Move Speed
description: Affects Allies positively and Enemies negatively

name: special_bonus_unique_lion_10
localized_name: Earth Spike affects a 30 degree cone

name: special_bonus_unique_lion_11
localized_name: +15% To Hell And Back Debuff/Spell Amp

name: special_bonus_unique_ogre_magi_5
description: Also reduces cooldown of Unrefined Fireblast

name: special_bonus_unique_underlord_9
localized_name: 125 DPS in 700 Radius Around Fiend's Gate

name: special_bonus_unique_naga_siren_7
localized_name: Song of the Siren heals allies %value% Max HP/s

name: special_bonus_unique_slark_5
localized_name: +1 Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack

name: special_bonus_unique_nevermore_6
description: Max Fear duration increased by +**0.45**s

name: skywrath_mage_shield_of_the_scion
description: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he gains a magic damage barrier. Each buff stacks independently.
lore: The court mages of Skywrath may only deploy their magic in defense of the kingdom and the throne.

name: special_bonus_unique_warlock_10
localized_name: +8 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies
description: Maximum of +70 Attack Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_luna_8
localized_name: 2 Moon Glaives fired on Lucent Beam
description: Does not fire Glaives on Beams from Eclipse

name: harpy_scout_take_off
description: Harpy Scout gains flying movement at the cost of movement speed. Consumes mana while active.

name: kobold_tunneler_prospecting
description: Kobolds are adept at finding gold, increasing nearby allied heroes' GPM.

name: furbolg_enrage_attack_speed
description: When Hellbear dies, all nearby allies go into a frenzy gaining attack speed for a short amount of time.

name: furbolg_enrage_damage
description: When Hellbear Smasher dies, all nearby allies go into a rampage gaining bonus attack damage for a short amount of time.

name: forest_troll_high_priest_heal_amp_aura
description: Provides bonus Heal Amplification to all nearby allies.

name: abyssal_underlord_dark_portal
description:
Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for **3.5** seconds to teleport to the other side. Portals have to be at least **1500** away from each other.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base, in front of your fountain.
lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
scepter_description: Summons a Pit of Malice around each of the portals. Reduces cooldown.

name: enraged_wildkin_hurricane
description: The Wildwing Ripper calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a hurricane that can push a unit in the direction of Wildwing Ripper's choice.

name: broodmother_sticky_snare
description: Broodmother may create up to **5** invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time.  Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered.  Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.
lore: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Spinner's Snare.

name: kobold_disarm
description: Every third attack Kobold Soldier will disarm its target temporarily. Attack counter doesn't increase while ability is on cooldown.

name: special_bonus_unique_bounty_hunter_6
localized_name: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies

name: techies_sticky_bomb
description: Lobs a Sticky Bomb towards the target area. If it lands next to an enemy hero, the bomb will stick to it, slowing its movement speed. After a few seconds the bomb will explode, dealing damage in an area around the detonation and applying a secondary slow for **3** seconds.
lore: Such revolutionary brilliance was meant to be shared.

name: ogre_bruiser_ogre_smash
description: Ogre slowly charges a big attack stunning for **2.4** seconds and dealing **200**/**250**/**300**/**400** + **8%** of their current HP as damage to all units in front of him.

name: techies_reactive_tazer
description: Techies trigger an electric charge giving them bonus movement speed for a short period of time. Enemies attacking Techies are temporarily disarmed and get a Basic Dispel. At the end of the effect, the charge explodes, disarming all enemies within the radius.
lore: A steady bomb hand prefers an abundance of personal space.
shard_description: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals damage on detonation. Also deals damage to any enemy that attacks the affected ally.

name: fel_beast_haunt
description: Silences target unit.

name: berserker_troll_break
description: Whenever Hill Troll Berserker attacks a unit it applies break to it.

name: hill_troll_rally
description: Skeleton's allies gain bonus attack damage. This Aura stacks.

name: giant_wolf_intimidate
description: The Giant Wolf's ferocious roar reduces all nearby enemies total attack damage.

name: omniknight_martyr
description: Grants Debuff Immunity with **60%** magic resistance to the target, as well as bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs on them.
lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_9
localized_name: +2% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack

name: bloodseeker_blood_mist
description:
Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Sanguivore's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. 

Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by **0.5%** per second.
note: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Blood Mist.

name: special_bonus_unique_primal_beast_pulverize_pierces_magic_immunity
description: Damage is changed to Pure

name: tinker_warp_grenade
description:
Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for **2** seconds.

 The teleport location is always the ability's current cast range + **100** from Tinker's position when he threw the flare.
lore: Tinker's deadliest weapon instantly turns an enemy into space dust. Research to resolve the annoying 'perfect copy' side effect... is ongoing.
note: Will not teleport enemies if the distance is over **2000** units away.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Warp Flare.

name: creep_siege
description: Reinforced Units and Buildings Deal Bonus Damage to other Reinforced Units and Buildings and take less attack damage from other units.

name: creep_piercing
description: Piercing Units Deal Bonus Damage to non-hero, non-heavy units and reduced damage to heroes and heavy units.

name: creep_irresolute
description: Runty Units Deal reduced damage to hero units.

name: shadow_demon_demonic_cleanse
description:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration.  At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: The only one permitted to harm his more useful followers is Shadow Demon himself.
note: Negative buffs are continously removed from the target for the duration of the Cleanse.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Demonic Cleanse.

name: special_bonus_unique_elder_titan_bonus_spirit_speed
localized_name: +2.5% Astral Spirit Move Speed Per Hero

name: ancient_rock_golem_weakening_aura
description: The Rock Golem's imposing figure makes enemies more susceptible to Physical Damage.

name: black_drake_magic_amplification_aura
description: The Black Drakes' gaze make enemies more susceptible to Spell Damage.

name: special_bonus_unique_legion_commander_8
localized_name: Press the Attack grants 1.5s Debuff Immunity
description: Also increases magic resistance by 50%

name: oracle_rain_of_destiny
description: Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced Heal Amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming Heal Amplification.
lore: Through mixture of the astral and the atmospheric, Nerif bends a single reality into paradoxical alignment.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Rain of Destiny.

name: warpine_raider_seed_shot
description: Hucks a seed at a target, slowing and damaging it. The seed can bounce multiple times to nearby targets.

name: frostbitten_golem_time_warp_aura
description: Coming from a different era, the Frostbitten Golem has an innate control of time, speeding up the cooldowns of all nearby allies.

name: ice_shaman_incendiary_bomb
description: The Ice Shaman chucks a blue flame towards an enemy unit or building, dealing damage over time.

name: bounty_hunter_lookout
shard_description: Adds new ability: bounty_hunter_lookout.

name: brewmaster_primal_companion
description:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for **3**s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for **70** seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.
lore: Mangix doesn't hold to it by rule, but he vaguely recalls an old master musing that, if one could manage, scaring up a companion was always preferable to drinking alone.

name: brewmaster_fire_phase
description: Provides the Brewling with phased movement and bonus Status Resistance.

name: lina_flame_cloak
description: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.
lore: A natural defense equally suited to keeping anything from unwanted sisters to snarling hellbeasts at bay.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Flame Cloak.

name: chen_martyrdom
description: Sacrifice the life of this unit to instantly heal an ally for **30%** of this unit's current health.

name: special_bonus_unique_chen_12
localized_name: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

name: crystal_maiden_crystal_clone
description: Slides in a direction, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a **450** AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.
lore: So convincing that some allies have spent minutes talking to the clone before they realized she wasn't speaking back.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Crystal Clone.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_MOVEMENT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE

name: tidehunter_arm_of_the_deep
shard_description: Adds new ability: tidehunter_arm_of_the_deep.

name: special_bonus_unique_brewmaster_8
localized_name: +%bonus_active_multiplier% Brewed Up Multiplier for Drunken Brawler

name: special_bonus_unique_lina_8
localized_name: Spells deal %bonus_bonus_spell_damage% more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

name: centaur_mount
description: Centaur tosses an ally into a cart hitched behind him. While in the cart, the ally is invulnerable and can still cast and attack normally, but cannot move independently or be targeted by opponents. Increases the attack range of melee heroes by **200**.
lore: The needs of Bradwarden's ample pride pale greatly in the face of his demand for victory.

name: enchantress_little_friends
description: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for **6** seconds.
lore: The laws of the forest may be oblique, but punishment for breaking them is swift and smiling.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Little Friends.

name: viper_nose_dive
description: Viper slams into the ground, releasing a Nethertoxin and splattering each enemy in a **500** AoE for **4** seconds with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
lore: It was thought that Netherdrake wings touch ground only in death, but some surmise that those who've witnessed more intentional landings merely haven't survived to tell the tale.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Nosedive.

name: spirit_breaker_planar_pocket
description: Barathrum gains magic resistance and distorts reality around the selected hero, making any unit-targeted spells cast by enemy heroes get redirected towards Spirit Breaker. Can be cast on both allied and enemy heroes, but only spells cast by enemies of Spirit Breaker will be redirected.
lore: Barathrum's unyielding focus forms a pocket of planar convergence from which not even the most powerful arcane energies can escape.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Planar Pocket.

name: primal_beast_onslaught
description:
Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him. 

 Can be cancelled at any time with the Stop command.
lore: The Beast's single-minded focus on chosen prey leaves all other considerations scattered in his ruinous wake.

name: primal_beast_onslaught_release
description: Begins the rush to the specified location.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL

name: primal_beast_trample
description: Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every **140** units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.
lore: As the only member of his species to arrive on this world, locals can only speculate on the Beast's size relative to his kin. Such observation would prove easier of course if the subject didn't eat everything it sees and destroy most of what it doesn't.

name: primal_beast_uproar
description:
The Beast's temper causes every instance of **50** hero damage or more to grant a stack of Uproar. 

 When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for **7** seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.
lore: Already draped in a broken patchwork of barding and chains upon appearing in the mistwoods, the Beast tolerates no further attempts at subjugation.
note:
Primal Beast cannot gain Uproar stacks from self damage.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
scepter_description: When Primal Beast activates Uproar, he releases **3** waves of **2** projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around him. Projectiles deal damage and Break enemies hit. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.

name: primal_beast_pulverize
description: CHANNELED - Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Each consecutive hit deals bonus damage. Lasts **2.3** seconds.
lore: Though none are certain whether his utterances have true meaning, most concede the Beast's powerful grip and tendency to smash his enemies into naught but pulp and pieces communicates his intent well enough.

name: furion_curse_of_the_forest
description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within **900** range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and dealing damage over time based on the number of trees within **250** radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.
lore: Though powerful, Nature's Prophet's gifts do not include all-sight, and he must rely heavily upon reconnaissance and aid from a long-standing network of stalwart friends.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Curse of the Oldgrowth.

name: shadow_demon_disseminate
description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within **675** range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.
lore: Friends and families share in the suffering when Shadow Demon finds a new victim.

name: beastmaster_drums_of_slom
description:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of **0.5**s between hits after **20** attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10 attacks.
lore: Nature's rage is timeless, and for those who know the secrets, it's easy to stir the echoes of ire that rejoiced in the downfall of Slom.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Drums of Slom.

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_wild_axe_cooldown
description: Axes still must return to Beastmaster before they can be cast again.

name: naga_siren_reel_in
description: CHANNELED - Naga Siren channels for up to **5** seconds, pulling all units affected by Naga's Ensnare in a **1600** range towards her at a speed of **200**. Channeling ends when the Ensnared unit is **100** distance away.
lore: Even the youngest Slithereen are well schooled in trawling for prey with nothing but their wits and nets.
scepter_description: Allows Reel In to affect Spell Immune units.

name: special_bonus_unique_dazzle_poison_touch_attack_range_bonus
description: +**200** Attack Range when attacking an enemy affected by Poison Touch

name: special_bonus_unique_magnus_reverse_polarity_stats
localized_name: +12 All Attributes per hero hit with Reverse Polarity
description: Bonus Stats last for **20**s

name: special_bonus_unique_medusa_7
localized_name: +%bonus_movement_slow% Mystic Snake Turn and Movement Speed Slow

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_hunter_status_resist
localized_name: +20% Hunter in the Night Status Resistance

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_refraction_disable_cast
localized_name: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled

name: special_bonus_unique_ursa_enrage_radius
localized_name: Enrage provides half benefits to allies in a %bonus_aoe_radius% radius

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_plasmafield_second_ring
localized_name: Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By 0.8s
description: The second plasma field does **30%** less damage

name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_dissimilate_outerring
description: Add a partial outer ring to Dissimilate

name: special_bonus_unique_silencer_glaives_bounces
description: Glaives of Wisdom Bounce to targets withing a %bonus_bounce_range% range.

name: flagbearer_creep_aura_effect
description: The Flagbearer inspires all allied creeps, granting them bonus health regeneration and magic resistance.
note: Magic resistance bonus upgrades by **4%** every 7.5 minutes, up to a maximum of **15** upgrades.

name: special_bonus_unique_drow_ranger_gust_invis
description: Does not reveal Wards

name: nyx_assassin_jolt
description: Deals damages to the enemy equal to a percentage of its Max Mana. Deals additional damage equal to a percentage of the damage the target has taken from Nyx Assassin in the last **15**s. Resets accumulated damage before applying damage.
lore: Only those raised by the queen can use their minds to touch the world around them.

name: venomancer_noxious_plague
description: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.
lore: Deep in the heart of the jungles of Jidi, the seeds of extermination freely grow.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_PSEUDO_QUEUE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL

name: meepo_megameepo
description:
Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a **600** radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains **40%** of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.

 When cast, Earthbind generates additional nets and Poof deals bonus damage based on the amount of Meepos riding on top.
lore: Hi, Meepos!
scepter_description: Adds new ability: MegaMeepo.

name: zuus_lightning_hands
description: Zeus gains bonus attack speed and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.
lore: A helping hand from Aghanim lets the fallen Lord of Heaven tap into some of his old strengths.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Lightning Hands.

name: ogre_magi_dumb_luck
description: Ogre Magi's max Intelligence is 0. He receives mana and mana regeneration from Strength.

name: alchemist_corrosive_weaponry

ability_special.header: BASE ATTACK DAMAGE REDUCTION PER STACK:

description:
Alchemist coats his weapons and empowers his spells with an acid that applies a stacking slow and base attack damage reduction to enemies hit.

Attacks apply **2** stacks. Unstable Concoction applies **1** stack per second of brew time.
lore: A powerful solvent that turned out to work all too well.

name: clinkz_tar_bomb
description:
Clinkz throws a projectile filled with tar at the target enemy, dealing Magic damage on impact. After impact, the tar spills onto the ground and stays there for **5** seconds. Any enemy that walks across it gets slowed, and attacks from Clinkz or his Skeleton Archers will deal bonus physical damage.

 When the Tar Bomb hits, any Skeleton Archers within attack range will attack the target. If autocast is activated, Clinkz will throw a tar bomb when attacking the target, if it is available.
lore: After his battle with Maraxiform, Clinkz found a useful source of ichor where his heart used to be.

name: clinkz_strafe
description:
Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Skeleton Archers within a **1200** radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and **50%** of the attack speed bonus. 

 Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.
lore: The closest Clinkz can come to peace is knowing that this was the last thing Maraxiform ever saw.

name: drow_ranger_glacier
description: Drow creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast.
lore: Traxex wasn't just adopted by the Drow, she was adopted by the lands they lived in.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Glacier.

name: magnus_strength_of_joelrak
shard_description: Adds new ability: magnus_strength_of_joelrak.

name: special_bonus_unique_enchantress_enchant_health_damage
localized_name: +150 Health / +25 Damage  for Enchantress and her units
description: Requires at least 1 level of Enchant

name: special_bonus_unique_primal_beast_trample_unslowable
localized_name: Cannot be slowed or rooted during Trample

name: centaur_work_horse
description: Centaur hitches a cart behind him. While active, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede for the current level of Stampede, and can cast Hitch a Ride on a target ally.
lore: It is a great honor to be offered a ride by Centaur Warrunner and a grave mistake to refuse it.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Work Horse.

name: bounty_hunter_wind_walk_ally
description: Applies Shadow Walk and all of its bonuses to the target ally. Allied fade time is **0.5**s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast.
lore: Useful for the rare instances when a contested bounty is actually wanted alive.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Friendly Shadow.

name: special_bonus_unique_disruptor_consecutive_strike_damage
description: Every strike increases the damage of subsequent strikes until the debuff expires

name: antimage_counterspell_ally
description: Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and reflects any targeted spells. Any time a spell is blocked by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.
lore: The only magic that Anti-Mage will even barely tolerate... is friendship.

name: special_bonus_unique_leshrac_pulse_nova_lightning
description: Lightning Storm hits a random enemy in Pulse Nova radius every **2**s with a single bolt. Prioritizes heroes.

name: techies_reactive_tazer_stop
description: Detonate Reactive Tazer immediately.

name: axe_one_man_army
description: Axe gains Strength based on his armor as long as he's away from his allies.
note: **40%** of Axe's armor is gained as strength as long as there are no allied heroes within **700** distance from Axe. Lingers for an additional **3**s after approaching an ally.

name: roshan_revengeroar
description: When facing the team that last killed him, Roshan will release an angry roar, heard everywhere on the map, that damages everyone in a **600** AoE and disarms them for **2** seconds. Units that have been roared take **25%** increased incoming damage.

name: seasonal_party_hat
description: CHANNELED. Steals an enemy hero's stack of Frostivus hats, or gives your stack to an allied hero.
scepter_description: Spirit of Frostivus becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of **400** in the target area. Hats are taken from enemies first, then evenly distributed amongst allies.

name: special_bonus_unique_enchantress_enchant_armor
localized_name: +5 Armor for Enchantress and her units
description: Requires at least 1 level of Enchant

name: special_bonus_unique_lina_crit_debuff
localized_name: +150% Crit On Targets Affected By Spells
description: Only applies to Lina's attacks. Lasts **3**s.

name: special_bonus_unique_ogre_magi_dumb_luck_mana
localized_name: +2/0.01 Dumb Luck Mana/Mana Regen Per Strength

name: special_bonus_unique_oracle_damage_per_purge
localized_name: Fortune's End Heals/Damages for 80 Per Effect Dispelled

name: special_bonus_unique_axe_culling_blade_speed_duration
localized_name: +3s Culling Blade Kill Buff Bonus Duration

name: special_bonus_unique_vengeful_spirit_wave_of_terror_steal
localized_name: Wave Of Terror Steals 25% Of Reduced Damage And Armor

name: warlock_imp_explode
description: Shortly after dying, a burst of magic damage is dealt to all enemies in a small area. Does **50%** less damage to non-hero targets.

name: axe_coat_of_blood
description: Axe permanently drenches his blade every time he kills an enemy Hero, gaining **0.2**/**0.3**/**0.4**/**.5** bonus armor for each stack. Killing with Culling Blade gives **3**x stacks.

name: bane_ichor_of_nyctasha
description: Bane's attribute gains are always evenly distributed across all three attributes (items that grant +3 Strength will now grant +1 Str/Agi/Int).

name: bloodseeker_sanguivore
description:
Bloodseeker restores some life when he kills a unit, equal to **30** health plus a percentage of the units max health.

Restores for half values if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero.
note: Creeps lifesteal is reduced by **40%**.

name: crystal_maiden_blueheart_floe
description: Crystal Maiden has **25**/**50**/**75**/**100%** Mana Regeneration Amplification.

name: drow_ranger_trueshot
description: Grants Drow bonus agility based on Drow's current agility and level. Nearby ranged heroes received **50%** of the bonus agility.
lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.

name: drow_ranger_vantage_point
description: Drow deals **30%** more damage when attacking from high ground.

name: juggernaut_duelist
description: Juggernaut deals **12%** more damage to targets that are facing him. Damage bonus always applies during Omnislash.

name: juggernaut_bladeform
description: Juggernaut gains Agility and Movement Speed as long as he's not taking damage.
note:
Grants a stack of Bladeform every **2**s that Juggernaut does not take damage. Each stack grants **2%** base agility bonus and **1%** movement speed with a max of **10** stacks. Stacks fade after **2**s upon taking any damage.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.

name: mirana_invis
description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. Mirana gains bonus outgoing damage during the duration. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
note: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.

name: mirana_solar_flare
description:
Gradually increases attack speed and damage of Mirana and all allied heroes, reaching maximum power after **6**s. 

 Allies receive **50%** of the bonus.

name: mirana_selemenes_faithful
description: Healing Lotuses are **50%** more effective on Mirana and her allies.

name: nevermore_frenzy
description: Shadow Fiend gains Bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for **8** seconds. For the duration of the effect, Necromastery's Max Soul count is increased by **5**, but he loses that amount of souls after it is done.
lore: For Nevermore, there's as much delight in the harvest as there is in the feast.
note: Cannot be cast unless Shadow Fiend has enough souls to pay the cost.

name: special_bonus_unique_nevermore_frenzy_castspeed
localized_name: Feast of Souls Grants +30% Cast Speed

name: morphling_ebb
description: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now Agility.

name: morphling_flow
description: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now Strength. Morphling gains **1%** Spell Amp per **4** Agility.
note: Break disables the Spell Amp per Agility.

name: morphling_accumulation
description: Morphling receives **50%** of stat growth bonuses every half level instead of the full bonus at level up. All Attributes bonuses from skill points in the Talent Tree provide an additional +**3** to Morphling's primary attribute.

name: phantom_lancer_phantom_edge
description: When targeting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining bonus movement speed and evasion. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
note:
If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
Rush movement speed is **800**.
scepter_description: Increases Range. Whenever Phantom Lancer Rushes through enemies, he creates Juxtapose illusions that attack them. Additionally, every **600** units rushed creates a Juxtapose illusion that rushes to the target alongside Phantom Lancer.

name: puck_puckish
description: Whenever Puck disjoints an attack, it restores **10** + **2%** of its max mana and **10** + **2%** of its max health. Dodging a targeted spell projectile restores **3.5**x that amount. Does not apply to attacks by Towers.

name: pudge_innate_graft_flesh
description: Pudge's skin thickens permanently every time he kills an enemy Hero, gaining **1.1**/**1.4**/**1.7**/**2** bonus Strength for each stack.
note: Enemy Heroes that die within **450** of Pudge grant a stack regardless of its killer.

name: razor_storm_surge
description: There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

name: razor_dynamo

ability_special.header: SPELL AMP PER BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE:

description: Razor gains **1.25%** spell amplification for every **20** points of attack damage.

name: sandking_caustic_finale

ability_special.header: DYING UNIT'S MAX HEALTH AS DAMAGE:

description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when they die.
lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

name: sandking_scorpion_strike
description: Sand King strikes an area, performing an attack on all enemies in the area of effect, dealing extra damage. Enemies within an innermost radius of **125** take **40%** extra damage. Applies Caustic Finale and a slow to all enemies hit.
lore: Crixalis is certainly capable of mercy, but the soul of the sand finds few foes worth sparing.

name: storm_spirit_galvanized
description: Storm Spirit gains a charge of **0.2** mana regeneration per kill. Loses **2** charges per death. Leveling Ball Lightning gives Storm Spirit **3** bonus charges. Additionally every time he gains a charge he also gains **0.1** Mana Regen permanently.
note: Break disables the gaining of new stacks from kills.

name: sven_vanquisher
description: Sven's attacks deal **20%** bonus damage to stunned enemies.

name: sven_wrath_of_god
description: Sven gains additional attack damage from Strength.

name: tiny_insurmountable
description: Tiny gains Status and Slow Resistance from Strength. Slow Resistance also reduces the impact of Attack Speed slows.
note: Insurmountable does not reduce the effect of Grow's Attack Speed Reduction.

name: vengefulspirit_soul_strike
description: Vengeful Spirit's ranged attacks behave as if they were melee attacks.

name: vengefulspirit_retribution
description: Whenever an enemy hero kills Vengeful Spirit, they get a debuff until their next death, causing Vengeful Spirit to deal **20%** bonus damage to them.

name: windrunner_easy_breezy
description: Windranger's movement speed cannot be lower than **240** and can reach **600**.

name: lina_slow_burn
description: Lina's spells deal **125%** total damage. **60%** is dealt on impact and **65%** is dealt as burn damage over **3**s.

name: lich_death_charge
description: Lich cannot gain passive mana regeneration, but any unit dying within **1500** range of Lich restores **2.5%** of his Max Mana (Dying heroes restore **25%** of Lich's Max Mana). Instant mana restoration from items and abilities apply to Lich as normal.

name: lion_to_hell_and_back
description: Lion gains **20%** debuff duration and **20%** spell amplification for **90**s after respawning.

name: shadow_shaman_fowl_play
description:
When taking lethal damage, Shadow Shaman receives a strong dispel and survives as a 1 HP chicken. Incoming damage is reduced to zero for **1**s.

Cooldown is reset upon respawning.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: Rhasta had to learn early on how to stay one step ahead of those who (rightfully or wrongfully) wished him harm.
note:
Lethal Damage from Axe's Culling Blade and Necrophos's Reaper's Scythe will not be prevented.
Incoming damage reduction buff will prevent certain sources of HP removal from killing Shadow Shaman.
shard_description: Increases the amount of time incoming damage is reduced to **1.5** seconds. When Fowl Play is triggered, Shadow Shaman becomes invulnerable for **0.1** seconds and **3** additional uncontrollable chickens are created that last for **3** seconds. While Shadow Shaman is transformed, he can now use items.

name: slardar_seaborn_sentinel
description: Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration, attack damage, and armor while in a puddle, trail, or river.
scepter_description: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle, trail, or river. Increases puddle/trail radius by **75** and puddle/trail duration by **5**s.

name: tidehunter_krill_eater
description: Tidehunter begins the game much smaller and with -**-60** attack range and -**-60** Anchor Smash radius. Tidehunter grows larger with experience, gaining attacking range and Anchor Smash radius per level. Strength Gain increased.

name: tidehunter_blubber
description:
Tidehunter's hide removes negative status effects if he takes more than **450** damage. Removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
note:
Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards debuff removal.
The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for **7** seconds.

name: witch_doctor_gris_gris
description:
Witch Doctor gets a Gris-Gris, an item that cannot be dropped or placed in the backpack. When the owner dies, **100%** of the gold lost from death is added to the item, and will be refunded when the item is consumed. The value of the Gris-Gris is increased by 1 every **3**s. 

 Right-click to consume and permanently remove the item.

name: riki_innate_backstab
description: Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals additional bonus damage equal to a multiple of his Agility.
note:
Works when denying friendly units at **25%** effectiveness.
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.

name: enigma_gravity_well
description: Allies within **500** distance from Enigma have up to **9**/**11**/**13**/**15%** Damage Reduction. Effect starts at 0% at max distance and increases to its maximum strength when the ally is at **200** distance. Does not affect Enigma itself.

name: enigma_splitting_image
description: Enigma spawns Eidolons upon receiving damage.
note: Whenever Enigma takes more than **375** damage from any source, he spawns an Eidolon next to him. Damage counter resets to zero after **7**s. Eidolons created in this fashion grant **50%** experience and gold.

name: enigma_event_horizon
description: Units in a **600** radius moving away from Enigma have a **8**/**12**/**16**/**20%** movespeed penalty.

name: tinker_eureka
description: Tinker gains **1%** item cooldown reduction per **3** Intelligence, up to a maximum of **60%**.

name: special_bonus_unique_tinker_rearm_magic_resistance
description: Lasts for %bonus_armor_duration%s.

name: sniper_keen_scope
description: Increases Sniper's attack range.

name: necrolyte_ghost_shroud
description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.

name: warlock_golem_flaming_fists
description: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.

name: warlock_golem_permanent_immolation
description: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, dealing damage per second.

name: warlock_eldritch_summoning
description: Whenever an enemy unit dies while afflicted by one or more of Warlock's abilities, a minor imp is summoned that lasts for **15** seconds and explodes on death. Imps will automatically seek out nearby units, favoring fatally bonded heroes, and will explode when reaching their prey.
note:
Minor imps have **50**/**130**/**210**/**290**/**370** health and explode for **25**/**70**/**115**/**160**/**205** damage in a **400** radius.
Minor imps do not explode if killed by enemy heroes.
shard_description: Increases the power of all imps summoned by Warlock.

name: warlock_black_grimoire
description: Grants Warlock the item Black Grimoire, which can be consumed to gain experience for each kill Warlock participated in. Starts with 1 charge.

name: queenofpain_masochist
description: Queen of Pain has bonus Spell Amplification but a percentage of her spell damage is reflected back to her.

name: queenofpain_succubus
description: All sources of Spell Lifesteal also apply to Pure Damage. Queen of Pain gains Spell Lifesteal that increases with proximity to her enemies. Lifesteal is at its maximum when the enemy is **150** units or closer to her and at its minimum when the enemy is **800** units or further from her.

name: queenofpain_bondage
description: Whenever an enemy within **1200** range deals spell damage to Queen of Pain, she returns **16%** of the damage dealt.

name: special_bonus_unique_queen_of_pain_1
localized_name: +35 Attack Speed against Shadow Striked units

name: faceless_void_distortion_field
description: Enemy Attack Projectiles within **600** radius are slowed by **35**/**40**/**45**/**50%**.

name: faceless_void_time_zone
description: Creates a blister in spacetime, altering the movement, cast, projectile, cooldown, and turn rate speed of all units inside. Allies have increased speed and cooldown acceleration. Enemies have decreased speed, and have frozen ability and item cooldowns. Time Dilation does not tick down while inside.
lore: For the Acolytes of Clasz, stopping time is trivial, but manipulating the minutiae of its flow requires a mastery few have attained.

name: skeleton_king_spectral_blade
description: Curses units that Wraith King attacks, dealing a flat amount of damage and a percentage of the attack damage again after a delay. Vampiric Spirit's lifesteal applies to the curse damage and a unit cannot be cursed again for a short period of time.
lore: The eternal spite of every soul stolen by Ostarion bleeds into reality with each strike of his murderous blade.

name: skeleton_king_vampiric_spirit
description: Grants Wraith King Lifesteal. When slain Wraith King turns into a free pathing Wraith with Bonus Attack and Movement Speed for a short duration, delaying his death. Wraith King cannot reincarnate after being a Wraith.
note:
Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Does not affect Reincarnate deaths.
Break only disables the passive lifesteal component.
Respawn timer is reduced by Wraith duration.
scepter_description: Turns Vampiric Spirit into an aura, allowing allied heroes to turn into wraiths when slain. Extends wraith duration.

name: death_prophet_spirit_collector
description: Hero deaths empower your next Exorcism.
note:
Whenever a hero dies, Death Prophet traps their spirit for later use. When she casts Exorcism, each trapped hero spirit will replace a standard spirit. Hero spirits deal more damage than standard spirits.

When a hero is killed while Exorcism is active a standard spirit will be replaced with a hero spirit if possible and stored for the next cast of Exorcism.
Includes Death Prophet's own death.

name: phantom_assassin_immaterial
description:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Evasion improves with Phantom Assassin's levels. 

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

name: pugna_oblivion_savant
description: Pugna can cast spells and use items while channeling.
note:
Includes items which are channeled.
Can still only channel a single spell at a time.

name: dragon_knight_inherited_vigor
description: The life blood of the Dragon improves Dragon Knight's health regeneration and armor. Amount for both values is increased by **0.5** per level and is multiplied when in Dragon Form.

name: dazzle_innate_weave
description: Dazzle's abilities apply Weave to both allies and enemies they affect, increasing allied armor and reducing enemy armor. Multiple instances of this effect stack.
lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.

name: dazzle_nothl_boon
description: Dazzle's overhealing is converted into a barrier. Weave is stronger on allies and amplifies incoming heals from Dazzle.
note: Whenever Dazzle overheals himself or an ally, it grants that hero a physical damage barrier equal to the amount overhealed for **12** seconds. If the overhealed target already has a larger barrier its duration will be refreshed instead.

name: rattletrap_armor_power
description: Clockwerk's outgoing damage increases by **0.25%** per point of armor.

name: leshrac_chronoptic_nourishment
description: Leshrac restores mana equal to **25%** of damage dealt by his attacks. Only grants mana when attacking enemies that have mana. **50%** mana restoration penalty when attacking creeps.

name: leshrac_defilement
description: Leshrac gains AoE per intelligence.

name: furion_spirit_of_the_forest
description: Nature's Prophet gains **2%** bonus damage for each tree within **300**/**400**/**500**/**600** and a multiplier of that same bonus for each treant within **1200** distance of him.

name: life_stealer_unfettered
description:
Descend into a violent fury, gaining increased status and magic resistance. Applies a dispel and can be cast while disabled.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: dark_seer_quick_wit
description: Dark Seer also gains Attack Speed from Intelligence.
note: Dark Seer gains **1** Attack Speed from each point of Intelligence.

name: dark_seer_heart_of_battle
description: Dark Seer moves faster when near other heroes.
note: Dark Seer gains **7%** of the movement speed of heroes within **1200** radius. Base movement speed reduced.

name: dark_seer_mental_fortitude
description: Dark Seer's Intelligence cannot be lower than the average of his Strength and Agility.
note: If the average between his Strength and Agility is higher, he gains Bonus Intelligence to match them.

name: clinkz_bone_and_arrow
description: Clinkz summons a Skeleton Archer when he dies.

name: omniknight_healing_hammer
description: Ability damage done to enemies by Omniknight heals him over time.

name: huskar_blood_magic
description:
Huskar does not have mana. Mana costs of items are converted into health costs.

Huskar's Health Costs are Magical Damage and can be reduced by Magic Resist.

name: night_stalker_heart_of_darkness
description: During the night, Night Stalker's health regeneration is increased by **20%**.

name: night_stalker_night_reign
description: The game now starts at night instead of day. Night is longer than day. Night Stalker starts with a bonus level of Hunter in the Night.

name: broodmother_spiders_milk
description: Whenever Broodmother kills a unit, she and all units under her control in a **600** radius receive a buff that heals them for a percentage of the victims health every **0.5** seconds. Healing from creeps is reduced by **40%**.

name: bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss
description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by **100%** for **0.35**s.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a **1200** radius of each other.
lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
scepter_description: Increases cast range and applies Jinada on hit.

name: bounty_hunter_cutpurse
description: Bounty Hunter steals gold when targeting enemy heroes with his abilities or items.
note: Reapplying Track does not steal gold with Cutpurse.

name: bounty_hunter_big_game_hunter
description: When getting a kill or assist on an enemy that has a killing streak, Bounty Hunter receives **20%** extra gold.

name: jakiro_liquid_ice
description: Jakiro chill his enemies with ice added to his attack, slowing movement for **5** seconds and increasing damage taken from Jakiro's attacks and abilities. This effect does not apply to buildings. Shares a cooldown with Liquid Fire.
lore: The right maw of Jakiro opens, punishing all with bitter frost.
shard_description: Jakiro's Liquid Frost no longer shares a cooldown with Liquid Fire.

name: jakiro_double_trouble
description: Jakiro's attacks launch an attack from each head, but deal less damage each.

name: batrider_smoldering_resin
description: Batrider's attacks apply a debuff that deals **20%** of the attack damage every **1**s for **2**s.

name: chen_summon_convert
description:
Chen summons a convert to fight for him. The convert gains bonuses from Holy Persuasion and dies if Chen dies. Its maximum health is set to **220** + **80** per Chen Level.

 The spell stays on cooldown while the convert is alive, but refreshes whenever Chen respawns. The Convert counts towards Holy Persuasion max unit count. The Convert's ability level increases with Chen's level of Holy Persuasion.
lore: Chen's true strength is knowing which forces to call upon in battle.

name: spectre_spectral
description:
When targeting a unit for attack, Spectre gains phased collision.  If she moves through a unit, she gains **50** movement speed.  This effect lingers for **0.3**s.

Spectre's illusions always have phased collision, and cannot gain the speed bonus.

name: doom_bringer_lvl_pain
description: Doom's attacks deal **25%** bonus damage to heroes whose level is lower than Doom's level.
note: Also applies to all attacks when Doom is at max level.

name: doom_bringer_devils_bargain
description: Doom can sell items for %bonus_item_sellback_percent% of their value, but his buyback costs are increased by %bonus_buyback_penalty%.

name: ancient_apparition_death_rime
description: Ancient Apparition's abilities apply Death Rime Stacks on enemies. Death Rime slows enemies' movement speed and deals damage over time.

name: ursa_maul
description: Ursa gains bonus damage equal to a percentage of his Current HP.

name: ursa_bear_down
description: Debuffs inflicted by Ursa last longer.

name: spirit_breaker_herd_mentality
description: The hero on your team whose level is lower than anybody else's on your team gains **50%** more experience.

name: gyrocopter_chop_shop
description: Gyrocopter can disassemble most items.
note:
Cannot disassemble Divine Rapier or Hand of Midas.
Gyrocopter can always sell recipes for full value.

name: alchemist_goblins_greed
description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next **40** seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.
lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
scepter_description: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. Alchemist will gain **25** bonus damage for each gifted Scepter.

name: invoker_mastermind
description: When Invoker denies a lane creep, he gets **25%** of the XP.

name: silencer_brain_drain
description: If Silencer kills an enemy hero, he permanently steals Intelligence.
note: To permanently steal Intelligence, Silencer doesn't need to land the killing blow, as long as the enemy hero is killed within **925** range of Silencer or was debuffed by Silencer at the time of death.
shard_description: Increases the Intelligence stolen per kill.

name: obsidian_destroyer_ominous_discernment
description: Outworld Destroyer gains an additional **2.5** mana per point of Intelligence.

name: lycan_apex_predator
description: Lycan and units he controls deal **2%** extra damage to neutral creeps per hero level.

name: shadow_demon_shadow_servant
description: Shadow Demon creates illusions of heroes that die near him.
note:
Heroes killed by Shadow Demon spawn an illusion regardless of distance.
The illusion disappears when the enemy hero respawns or Shadow Demon dies.

name: shadow_demon_menace
description: Shadow Demon's Attacks apply a stacking **2.5%** Amplify Damage debuff to the enemy for **8** seconds.
note:
Break disables the application of new stacks.
Break does not disable the effects of existing stacks.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear
description:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.

If the bear moves **1100** distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers **20%** of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies.
Spirit Bear has Demolish, Return, Entangling Claws, Savage Roar, and Spirit Link abilities.
lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
note:
Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.
Spirit Bear has 0 base attributes, 0 base armor, and %base_magic_resistance% base magic resistance. Attributes from buffs or items fully affect the bear as they would for Universal heroes.
Spirit Bear cannot gain experience. The Spirit Bear levels up when Lone Druid levels up.
Spirit Bear has its own Aghanim's Scepter and Shard upgrades.
Spirit Bear receives a copy of Lone Druid's Neutral Item that has an independent cooldown.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_return
description: Channels for **3** seconds and then teleports the Spirit Bear back to the Lone Druid.
scepter_description: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_entangle
description:
Allows Spirit Bear to Entangle enemy heroes once they gain **5** stacks. Entangled enemies are rooted and take damage over time.

Spirit Bear's attacks are permanently empowered, making them apply **1** stack with each attack on enemy heroes. Enemies cannot gain stacks while Entangled.
note:
Rooted units can't use Blink abilities and are revealed if they are invisible.
Enemy stack counter debuff cannot be dispelled.
Stacks are only applied to enemy heroes, creep heroes, and Roshan.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_fetch
description: Grabs the Target Ally, Enemy or Rune, and uncontrollably drags them towards Lone Druid for the duration. Enemies receive damage every **0.5**s. When dragging a unit, they are Rooted.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fetch.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_demolish
description: Spirit Bear deals more damage to buildings.

name: chaos_knight_phantasmagoria
description: All Chaos Knight Illusions are Strong Illusions and take less damage when near him.
note:
All illusions created by Chaos Knight or of Chaos Knight are Strong Illusions. Chaos Knight's Illusions within **1200** radius have **20%** damage reduction.
Also applies to Aghanim's Scepter Phantasm Illusions.
Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.
Break disables the passive Damage Reduction aura.

name: chaos_knight_reins_of_chaos
description: Whenever illusions of Chaos Knight are created, there is a **50%** chance that an additional **1** extra illusion will spawn.

name: meepo_pack_rat
description: All Meepos can use the item in the neutral item slot.
note:
Most items except for Consumables, Hand of Midas, and Divine Rapier can be equipped in the neutral item slot.
Using the item on one Meepo puts it on cooldown for all other Meepos for **50%** of the regular cooldown.
Certain passive abilities and effects on items have reduced or no effectiveness.

name: meepo_sticky_fingers
description: Has an extra choice of neutral item to select from.

name: undying_ceaseless_dirge
description: When Undying dies he will instantly respawn in the fountain. Begins the game on cooldown. Cannot be refreshed.
