lore: Only when the Dirge of the Dead God ceases will this soldier's march finally end.

name: rubick_might_and_magus
description: Each **1%** Spell Amplification also increases Rubick's attack damage by **0.75%** and Magic Resistance by **0.75%**.

name: disruptor_kinetic_fence
description: After a short formation time, creates a wall out of kinetic energy that enemies cannot pass.
lore: For a brief moment, it's as if the wind itself had turned solid.

name: disruptor_electromagnetic_repulsion
description: Whenever Disruptor takes more than **250** damage from any source within **400** radius, all nearby enemies within are pushed back up to a **400** unit distance.
lore: Safe harbor found inside the storm.
note: After **7**s, the damage counter is reset.

name: nyx_assassin_nyxth_sense
description: Nyx Assassin can detect heroes within **400** units of himself.

name: special_bonus_unique_nyx_vendetta_cd_manacost
description: Lasts for %bonus_break_duration% seconds.

name: naga_siren_deluge
description: Naga Siren and all of her images hit nearby units with a damaging wave of water that caps their max movement speed.
lore: There's no use trying to run through deep water.
note: Casting Deluge doesn't interrupt channeling.

name: naga_siren_eelskin
description: Naga Siren gets **8%** evasion per other Naga Siren within **900** radius.

name: keeper_of_the_light_radiant_bind
description: Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.
lore: Even a glimpse of the First Light is enough to rob enemies of their senses.
shard_description: Grants **0** charges.

name: wisp_sight_seer
description: Io's Team takes **1**s less to take watchers, and their watchers have **300** bonus vision.

name: slark_barracuda
note: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the passive movement and health regeneration bonuses are lost for %neutral_disable% seconds.

name: centaur_horsepower
description: Centaur Warrunner gains Movement Speed based on his Strength.
note:
Centaur Warrunner gains **30%** of his strength as bonus movement speed. Max movement speed for Centaur is increased to **575**.

 This Movement speed bonus does not stack with bonuses from boots.

name: centaur_rawhide
description: Permanently gain **25** max health every **120**s.

name: magnataur_solid_core
description: Magnus has slow resistance and suffers less knockback from enemy's abilities and items.

name: shredder_twisted_chakram
description: Launches a second independent Chakram that follows a curved path and returns to Timbersaw, damaging and slowing enemies it passes through. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every **5%** of health missing.
lore: A happy little accident in the lab turned wild new weapon in the forest.

name: shredder_exposure_therapy
description: Whenever Timbersaw destroys a tree, he gains **4**/**6**/**8**/**10** mana.

name: tusk_drinking_buddies
description: Tusk reaches out to tag an allied unit, pulling them closer. Once tagged, both Tusk and his tagged ally gain movement speed and attack damage. Can be put on alt-cast to only pull Tusk towards his ally with **50%** reduced cast range.
lore: The only thing better than finding a good drinking buddy is finding an equally good enemy the two of you can punch.
note:
Doesn't pull Tusk or targeted ally if they are within **250** range of each other.
Cannot be used during Snowball.

name: tusk_bitter_chill
description: Passively slows the attack speed of all enemy heroes within **350** radius by **20**/**40**/**60**/**80**.

name: skywrath_mage_staff_of_the_scion
description: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he reduces all his ability cooldowns by **0.1**s.
lore: To raise the ire of Skywrath is to invite retribution that strikes like a storm.

name: skywrath_mage_ruin_and_restoration
description: Skywrath Mage has **25**/**30**/**35**/**40%** Spell Lifesteal.

name: abaddon_the_quickening
description: Units dying nearby Abaddon lower his cooldowns.
note: Every time a unit dies within **900** range of Abaddon, reduce all of his Cooldowns by **0.2** seconds if they are a creep or **5** seconds if they are a hero.

name: elder_titan_ancestral_spirit
description:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage, armor, and movement speed for each unit it passed through.

The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.
lore: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.
scepter_description: Causes Elder Titan to become debuff immune and gain 50% magic resistance for **2** seconds per affected enemy Hero when the spirit returns.

name: elder_titan_momentum
description: Elder Titan's Base Attack Speed is reduced but his Movement Speed also grants Attack Speed.

name: earth_spirit_stone_caller
description:
Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time. Stone Remnant has **7** charges.

Earth Spirit passively gains **2.5%** bonus damage per unused Stone Remnant charge, and gains an additional **7.5%** bonus damage for **10**s when a Stone Remnant is targeted with an ability (does not stack).
lore: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.

name: terrorblade_dark_unity
description: Nearby Illusions created by Terrorblade have bonus attack damage.
note: Reflection Illusions are also affected.

name: phoenix_dying_light
description: Phoenix deals **4.5%** of his missing health as magic damage to all enemies in a **400** radius every second.

name: phoenix_blinding_sun
description: Phoenix ability debuffs apply a stackable **2%** Miss chance per second. Lasts **4** seconds.

name: oracle_clairvoyant_curse
description: Spell amplification increased by **1%** per hero level.

name: oracle_clairvoyant_cure
description: Heal amplification increased by **0.75%** per hero level.

name: oracle_prognosticate
description: Oracle will predict and announce to allies, where the next power rune will spawn (top or bottom).

name: techies_squees_scope
description: Techies gains **1** attack range and attack projectile speed for each point of attack speed.

name: techies_spoons_stash
description: Techies stack all previously selected Enchantments onto newly crafted Neutral Items.
note:
Only one Tier 5 Enchantment can be stacked after crafting your second Tier 5 Neutral Item.
Divine Regalia's Exalted loss of enchantment upon death only affects the most recently obtained Tier 5 enchantment.

name: winter_wyvern_eldwurm_scholar
description: When a Shrine of Wisdom grants experience to allies, Winter Wyvern shares the knowledge with her entire team, granting **20%** of the experience to each of the **3** heroes that did not collect the initial bonus.

name: winter_wyvern_essence_of_the_blueheart
description: Winter Wyvern's heals also restore mana.

name: winter_wyvern_dragon_sight
description: Winter Wyvern gains bonus damage when her attack range is over **400**.

name: arc_warden_runic_infusion
description: Upon activating any rune, gain the Regeneration Rune buff for **4**s.
note: Has **67%** duration when activating a Bounty or Water rune.

name: abyssal_underlord_abyssal_horde
description:
After teleporting through the Fiend's Gate, Underlord brings forth a Warrior or an Archer to aid him every **2**s that last for the duration of the Fiend's Gate.

The Archer has a passive movement speed aura.

name: abyssal_underling_warrior_last_will
description: Deals damage to the unit that kills the Necronomicon Warrior.

name: abyssal_underling_warrior_mana_burn
description: Mana burned per hit, a portion of which is dealt as damage.

name: abyssal_underling_archer_aoe
description: Increases movement of nearby units.

name: pangolier_fortune_favors_the_bold
description: Random item and ability effects of enemies near Pangolier have a reduced chance to affect him.
note:
Applies to hero abilities and items.
Effect is a relative reduction in chance for effects to happen.

name: dark_willow_pixie_dust
description: Whenever a skill makes Dark Willow become untargetable, she gains +**150%** HP Regen and +**150%** Mana Regen while in that state.

name: grimstroke_ink_trail
description: Adds an effect to Grimstroke's attacks that causes enemy heroes to leave a trail of ink behind them for **4**s.
note: Provides vision over affected heroes.

name: mars_dauntless
description: Mars gets more HP Regen the more he and his allies are outnumbered by enemy heroes in **700** radius.

name: mars_arena_of_blood
description: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.
lore: The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.

name: special_bonus_unique_mars_arena_of_blood_hp_regen
localized_name: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +180 HP Regen

name: void_spirit_symmetry
description: Void Spirit gains a physical damage barrier when dealing magic damage to enemy heroes.

name: void_spirit_intrinsic_edge
description: Void Spirit gains **25%** more HP regen from Strength, armor from Agility, and mana regen and magic resistance from Intelligence.

name: snapfire_buckshot
description: When attacking enemy heroes, Snapfire deals **30%** more damage with her auto attacks, but has a **25%** chance of a glancing shot, dealing **60%** damage.
note: Ricochet II attacks cannot miss.

name: hoodwink_hunters_boomerang
description: Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a debuff that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage.
lore: A precious last vestige of Hoodwink's childhood, converted into deadly distraction.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Hunter's Boomerang.

name: hoodwink_mistwoods_wayfarer
description: Hoodwink has a chance to redirect enemy attacks to a nearby tree.
note: Trees that take a redirected attack are destroyed.

name: dawnbreaker_break_of_dawn
description: Whenever the sun comes out, Dawnbreaker gains bonus base damage and vision that decreases throughout the course of the day.

name: marci_bodyguard
description:
Passively grants Marci lifesteal and bonus attack damage.

Marci protects an allied hero. For **6**s, the ally also gains **75%** of lifesteal and attack damage bonus. Whenever the ally attacks or is attacked by an enemy, Marci counter-attacks that target if they are within her attack range plus **125**.
lore: Marci learned at a young age that the best asset in a scrap is a steady companion.
note:
Marci cannot cast Bodyguard on herself.
Lifesteal effectiveness gets a **40%** penalty against creeps.
Marci's counter-attack has a **0.45**s cooldown.

name: marci_special_delivery
description:
Marci whistles to instantly summon her courier to her.

Passively grants all allied couriers **3** bonus levels and **1** bonus health.
lore: Professional courtesy, from one courier to another.
note: Special Delivery whistle has a cast point of **1** second.

name: special_bonus_unique_marci_unleash_extend_duration
localized_name: Unleash Duration Extended By 6s On Kill

name: primal_beast_colossal
description: Primal Beast deals **40%** more damage to buildings.

name: muerta_ofrenda
description:
Muerta places a sacred altar at the targeted location that increases her attack speed when she is near it.

When respawning, Muerta will gain the benefits of Pierce The Veil's corporeal form for **50%** of the duration and respawn at the Ofrenda.

Muerta can select the Ofrenda and force it to destroy itself. Only one Ofrenda can exist at a time.

name: muerta_supernatural
description: Muerta can always attack when she is ethereal. Muerta can always attack ethereal targets. When attacking ethereal targets, all of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage.

name: muerta_ofrenda_destroy
description: Destroy this Ofrenda, ensuring that Muerta will respawn in the fountain.

name: special_bonus_unique_muerta_calling_hp_regen
localized_name: +3% Max HP Regen while inside The Calling
description: Only applies to Muerta.

name: special_bonus_unique_muerta_gunslinger_bonus_damage
description: Affects both shots.

name: antimage_persectur
description: Attacks slow enemies based on how much mana they are missing. Min slow at **50%** mana, up to max slow at **0%** mana. No effect if enemy is above **50%** mana.
note: Full effect if caused by illusions.

name: earthshaker_spirit_cairn
description: When Earthshaker dies, a **75** radius fissure is created where he died. This fissure blocks movement and allows Earthshaker to continue to gain experience around it. It remains until Earthshaker respawns.

name: phantom_lancer_illusory_armaments
description: Whenever an illusion of Phantom Lancer is created, its outgoing damage cannot go below a fixed value for **3** seconds.

name: kunkka_admirals_rum
description: Damage from enemy heroes, buildings, or Roshan that would reduce Kunkka below a threshold causes him to douse himself with The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
lore: Deleterious to landlubbers, no one holds their rum like a sailor.
note: Stacks additively with other sources of Admiral's Rum

name: lina_combustion
description: Every **175** damage Lina does to an enemy hero causes them to overheat, doing damage to their nearby allies. This effect can trigger multiple times off a single instance of damage. Overheated illusions do less damage.

name: beastmaster_rugged
description: Beastmaster's melee hero Damage Block Chance is increased from **50%** to **100%** versus non-hero units and non-building units.

name: venomancer_sepsis
description: Venomancer's attacks deal extra damage based on how many debuffs the attack target has. Extra damage is dealt as magical damage. Only counts debuffs from Venomancer or his Plague Wards.
note: Break only disables the bonus damage for Venomancer's attacks.
scepter_description: Increases base damage per debuff.

name: death_prophet_mourning_ritual
description: Death Prophet delays a percentage of incoming damage, taking the damage in even intervals over a short duration.
note: Delayed damage matches the damage type of the initial damage and bypasses armor, magic resistance, and damage block.

name: templar_assassin_third_eye
description: Templar Assassin and her teammates can see Roshan's respawn timer.

name: viper_predator
description: Viper's attacks deal an additional instance of physical damage per missing health percentage of the target hero, equal to **0.15** + **0.05** per Viper's level.

name: luna_lunar_orbit
description: Creates **4** glaives that rotate **225** radius around Luna. Any enemy unit that collides with a glaive will take a percentage of Luna's Attack Damage.
lore: None may approach Selemene's chosen without favor from the goddess herself.
shard_description: Increases collision damage. Glaives rotate **50%** faster.

name: enchantress_rabblerouser
description: All neutral camps and Creeps under Enchantress' control deal more damage to enemy heroes.
note: Does not affect converted neutrals, Tormentor, or Roshan.

name: weaver_rewoven
description: Every time Weaver casts an ability, he gains **50** attack range for **7**s. This effect stacks independently.
note:
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.

name: lycan_summon_wolves_hamstring
description: The wolf bites down on an enemy's hamstring, rooting them for a short duration. After the bite, the next **4** attacks from units controlled by Lycan deal bonus damage.

name: lycan_summon_wolves_hightail
description: The wolf gains a short burst of energy, gaining phased movement, evasion, hasted movement speed, and attack speed.

name: brewmaster_belligerent
description: Brewmaster gains %damage_pct% bonus attack damage for %damage_duration_split%s when he comes out of Primal Split and for %damage_duration_respawn%s when he respawns.

name: lone_druid_gift_bearer
description: Lone Druid's Spirit Bear receives a copy of his Neutral Item that has an independent cooldown.

name: lone_druid_bear_necessities
description: Lone Druid can only use the first **3** items in his inventory. These items' passive bonuses are more powerful. Other item slots do not provide any bonuses. Neutral slot is unaffected.
note:
The following attributes can be increased:
* Intelligence, Strength and Agility
* Health, Mana and Evasion
* Attack Speed and Bonus Damage
* Health and Mana Regen

name: visage_lurker
description:
Visage's ability cooldown durations are accelerated as long as he's not taking damage.

Grants a stack every **2**s that Visage does not take damage. Each stack grants **2%** cooldown acceleration with a max of **8** stacks. Stacks fade after **2**s upon taking any damage.
note:
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.
Affects Visage's ability cooldown durations, including spells already on cooldown.

name: medusa_gorgon_grasp
description: Medusa fires arrows in a line that land in **3** groups, with each grouping larger than the previous. Enemies struck by a volley of arrows take an initial burst of damage and then are rooted, cannot turn, are revealed to the enemy, and take damage per second.
lore: The best predators don't even need to pounce.

name: medusa_venomed_volley
description: Every **6** attacks, Medusa applies poison to her arrow that briefly reduces movement speed and attack speed.
note: Poisoned attack is considered an on-hit effect for Split Shot.

name: troll_warlord_switch_stance
description: Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have decreased base attack time.
lore: Jah'rakal has a variety of ways to get under an enemy's skin.

name: bristleback_prickly
description: Bristleback has **10%** damage and debuff duration amp against enemy heroes that are behind him.

name: abaddon_withering_mist
description: Damaging enemies applies the Withering Mist debuff for **5**s. Affected enemies have their Health Restoration reduced by **35%** if they are below **40%** HP.

name: elder_titan_tip_the_scales
description: Allied creeps and buildings affected by Glyph of Fortification or Roshan's Banner deal **100%** bonus damage.

name: legion_commander_outfight_them
description: Attacking an enemy hero that is equal or higher level than you increases your Health Restoration by **30**/**40**/**50**/**60%** for **4**s.

name: ember_spirit_immolation
description: Ember Spirit is continuously burning, dealing damage per second to all nearby enemies at all times.
note: Break does not disable Immolation for Fire Remnants when upgraded with Aghanim's Shard.
shard_description: Grants Fire Remnants the current level of Immolation, and increases the damage and radius.

name: special_bonus_unique_arc_warden_flux_silences
localized_name: Flux Silences when target is alone

name: abyssal_underlord_raid_boss
description: After an allied hero Teleports, they temporarily gain Damage Reduction and Movement Speed. Allies receive **2**x bonuses if teleporting via Fiend's Gate.

name: special_bonus_unique_ringmaster_dagger_bleed_and_slow_duration
localized_name: +1s Impalement Arts Bleed and Slow Duration

name: earthshaker_slugger

ability_special.header: FLYING ENEMY'S MAX HEALTH AS DAMAGE:

description: Enemies killed with Enchant Totem or Earthshaker's other abilities are sent flying, dealing damage to enemies they hit.

name: kez_switch_weapons
description:
Kez switches between his Kazurai Katana and Shodo Sai.

He gains different attack capabilities and abilities based on the weapon equipped. The abilities level up together, and when an ability is used, the associated alternate weapon ability also goes on cooldown.
lore: As former followers of the Shodo, the leaders of the Kazurai Order can switch effortlessly between twin disciplines of martial mastery over sai and blade.
scepter_description:
Casting a weapon ability that would set its alternate weapon ability on cooldown does not do so if it's the first one used within **3** seconds after casting Switch Discipline.

Casting any weapon ability refreshes the cooldown of Switch Discipline.

name: kez_echo_slash
description: Kez slashes forward in a line with his Katana, attacking enemies in an area and applying a brief slow. After a short delay, the area is attacked again. Heroes take bonus damage.
lore: Kez and his master Kraw have worked tirelessly to train the Kazurai new ways to keep the flyers off balance by improving upon ancient techniques.
note: Destroys trees. Doesn't apply Cleave.

name: kez_grappling_claw
description: Kez swings on a grappling hook towards the target unit or tree.  When the grappling hook collides with the target, that unit has slowed movement speed. Upon reaching the enemy target, Kez lands an attack on them.
lore: The Kazurai have the speed and reach to drag even the highest flyers from the skies.

name: kez_kazurai_katana
description:
Katana attacks and abilities apply a stacking damage over time to enemies that deals a percentage of the original attack's damage as additional damage over time. 

Kez may activate the ability to impale the target with his attack, preventing them from moving or turning. The target's Katana debuff bursts, causing some of the stacks to deal damage instantly.
lore: To fight back against the reach of Imperia and her Queensguard, the Kazurai had to become skilled in the ways of attrition.
shard_description: Kez lifesteals **100%** from the impale. If the impale comes from behind the target, the target is stunned. Increases max burst stacks.

name: kez_raptor_dance
description:
Kez enters into an uncontrollable state for **1** second, becoming invulnerable for **0.2**s and receiving a basic dispel, remaining immune to magic damage for the remainder of the cast time and the duration of the slashes.

 If the cast completes successfully, Kez performs a series of deadly radial slashes around him that deal damage based on the max health of the target and heal Kez for a percentage of all damage dealt.
lore: Unleash the inner fury of the Flightless to feast on the essence of your foes.
note: Slash Lifesteal is reduced to **20%** when slashing a creep or an illusion.

name: kez_falcon_rush
description: Kez gains the ability to rush towards enemy targets to deliver echoing secondary attacks.  While in this state, Kez has phased collision and slow resistance.
lore: An ancient Shodo technique used to hunt faster aerial foes, stealing the advantage and delivering multiple attacks within a single flap of their prey's panicking wings.
note: Echo attacks have reduced chance to trigger random effects proportional to their damage percentage.

name: kez_talon_toss
description: Kez throws a Sai at the target unit, applying a fixed damage attack and silence.
lore: The Shodo learned to rely upon distance and disorientation to survive against much stronger opposition.
note: The fixed damage attack has True Strike.

name: kez_shodo_sai
description: Kez's attacks and abilities with the Sai have a chance to Mark enemies. The next attack or ability damage from Kez will stun the enemy and deal a critical strike, consuming the buff. Kez may activate the ability to disarm himself, lock his facing, and parry attacks and attack effects from the targeted direction for **2** seconds. If an attack is parried from an enemy Hero in this way, that Hero is stunned and gains a stronger Mark that stuns for longer and deals **4%** * Target Hero Level bonus critical strike. The sub-ability may be used to cancel the blocking early.
lore: The Shodo may have lost their way, but Kez and the Kazurai can still use Shodo knowledge for the good of the people.

name: kez_shodo_sai_parry_cancel
description: Stop blocking physical attacks.

name: kez_ravens_veil
description: Kez releases a wave of smoke that applies his Mark to nearby enemies, briefly reducing their vision. Kez receives a basic dispel and gains bonus movement speed and invisibility until he attacks or casts a spell.
lore: Eying either threat or opportunity, Shodo masters slip instantly into shadow to reset the terms of any engagement in their own favor.

name: special_bonus_unique_kez_echo_slash_strike_count
description: -0.6s Interval

name: special_bonus_unique_kez_ravens_veil_mark_parry_bonus
localized_name: Raven's Veil Mark Applies Parry Bonus

name: miniboss_alleviation
description: After death, the Tormentor leaves behind a verdant dale, increasing the regeneration of everyone nearby by **2%** of their Max Health.

name: frogmen_riverborn_aura
description: Whenever the Frog is in water, it increases all allied movement speed and outgoing damage.

name: frogmen_arm_of_the_deep
description: Sends out a slew of tentacles in the target direction, stunning and damaging enemies.

name: frogmen_tendrils_of_the_deep
description: Sends out a cone-shaped slew of tentacles in the target direction, stunning and damaging enemies.

name: frogmen_congregation_of_the_deep
description: Sends out a slew of tentacles in all directions, stunning and damaging enemies.

name: frogmen_water_bubble_small
description: Creates a barrier bubble that protects the target from magic damage for **10**s.

name: frogmen_water_bubble_medium
description: Creates a barrier bubble that protects the target from magic damage for **10**s. After it expires, it heals the target for **50%** of the absorb amount.

name: frogmen_water_bubble_large
description: Creates a barrier bubble that protects the target from magic damage for **10**s. After it expires, it heals the target and all allies in a **675** AoE for **50%** of the absorb amount.

name: special_bonus_unique_enchantress_enchant_attackspeed
localized_name: +30 Attack Speed for Enchantress and her units
description: Requires at least 1 level of Enchant

name: shadow_shaman_voodoo_hands
description: Your next attack on an enemy hero transforms them into a chicken for **1**s.
lore: Even a brief moment as a chicken is long enough to make most would-be aggressors rethink their mark.
note: Talents that affect Hex also affects enemies transformed by Chicken Fingers.

name: dazzle_nothl_projection
description: Dazzle departs his body, traveling through the Nothl Realm as an invulnerable spirit that can cast spells, attack, and use items, leaving his body behind in the world with a visible tether. While active, Dazzle's basic abilities are empowered: Poison Touch hexes enemies, Shallow Grave heals upon expiration, and Shadow Wave has a shorter cooldown. The effect can be ended early, and Dazzle returns to the body at the end.
lore: The allure of the Nothl Realm is intoxicating, but Dazzle never forgets his purpose for being there.
note:
When Dazzle's spirit is further than **1600** units from the body, the tether will begin to pull him back. The strength of the pull increases with distance.
Dazzle's Soul cannot attack buildings.
shard_description: Nothl Projection can be cast while Dazzle is disabled. Increases healing done while in the Nothl Realm.

name: dazzle_nothl_projection_end
description: Ends Dazzle's sojourn in the Nothl Realm and returns his spirit to his body.

name: dark_seer_aggrandize
description: When Dark Seer levels up, he restores a percentage of his max health and mana. Restore percentage is equal to **10%** + **1.5%** per hero level.

name: jakiro_ice_path_detonate
description: Destroy the Ice Path, dealing damage and stunning enemies.

name: chaos_knight_fundamental_forging
description: Whenever Chaos Knight crafts a Neutral Item, **2** of his Artifact options will be from the next tier and **2** will be from the current tier. He is not guaranteed to be able to keep an Artifact between tiers. When crafting at the highest tier, all options are for that tier.

name: keeper_of_the_light_special_reserve
description: Keeper of the Light cannot go below **75** mana.

name: medusa_undulation
description: Medusa's movement speed is fixed at **310** (**465** during Stone Gaze). Medusa is unslowable and does not benefit from movement speed increases.
note: Medusa can still benefit from movement speed bonuses from stream currents.

name: special_bonus_unique_timbersaw_exposure_therapy_health
localized_name: Exposure Therapy Heals for 10 HP Per Tree Destroyed

name: special_bonus_unique_hoodwink_sharpshooter_vision
description: Also Grants True Sight. Does Not Reveal Wards.

name: special_bonus_unique_dawnbreaker_gleaming_hammer
localized_name: Celestial Hammer emits Solar Guardian aura
description: **200** AoE. Hammer stationary duration increased by **2**. Damaging and Healing is **40%** of Solar Guardian's.

name: kez_shadowhawk_passive
description: Triggering a Shodo Sai Mark from invisibility deals bonus critical damage. Increases Raven's Veil invisibility duration.

name: furion_summon_fey
shard_description: Adds new ability: furion_summon_fey.

name: furion_natures_profit
description: Whenever Nature's Prophet kills an enemy hero or one dies within a **750** radius, a money tree is created in their place. Every tick, several bags of gold are dropped that can be picked up by nearby heroes. The amount of gold is equal to a multiplier of the slain hero level.

name: silencer_oppressive_silence
description: Silencer takes less damage from and deals more damage to silenced targets.

name: wisp_essence_conduction
description: Io regenerates from consumables and certain items **2**x faster.
note:
Total amount of restored health or mana remains the same.

Only applies to Healing Salve, Tango, Clarity, Bottle, Urn of Shadows, Spirit Vessel, Mana Draught, and Pollywog Charm.

name: monkey_king_transfiguration
description: Monkey King can transform into any one of his soldiers during Wukong's command, taking its place for a **1.5**s, becoming indistinguishable from other soldiers, and leaving another soldier in his stead. While transformed, Monkey King is invulnerable, but cannot attack or cast spells

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_cold_snap_heal
description: When Cold Snap triggers on an enemy, Invoker is healed for the damage amount.

name: special_bonus_unique_kez_talon_toss_attack_factor
localized_name: Add %bonus_attack_factor% of Attack Damage to Talon Toss
description: Always uses Sai attack value.

name: largo_catchy_lick
description:
Largo licks the targeted unit with his tongue, pulling it back a short distance, applying a basic dispel, and dealing damage if it's an enemy.

Dispelling an effect from a target grants Largo temporary health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: After generations spent living on the ancient isaloth Velu'Mar, the descendants of the Murkroot exiles have grown resilient, happily sampling toxins that would've struck their ancestors dead.

name: largo_frogstomp
description: Largo tosses froglings to an area. They stomp the ground every **1** second, dealing damage and ministuns, and enemies in the area have reduced movement speed.
lore: Most Bard Monks spend decades mastering the musical arts, but even the top frog Largo has to admit that his young disciples have already grown shockingly good at counting a proper beat.

name: largo_croak_of_genius
description: Largo strums a tune to a friendly hero. The hero's items and abilities have reduced mana cost and a percentage of their damage reverberates over the following **5** seconds. When an affected hero spends mana, the remaining buff duration is reduced by **0.5**s.
lore: Largo loves to help his friends find glory through the power of music, never missing a chance at a killer duet.
note: Only applies to damage sources affected by spell amplification.

name: largo_amphibian_rhapsody

ability_special.header: SONG MANA COST REDUCTION PER STACK:

description:
Largo gets ready to groove. He is disarmed and his ability bar switches to 3 song abilities, each with different effects. Songs are only effective if strummed on the beat.

Every time he strums successfully, he gains a stack of Groovin'. Each stack gives him bonus armor and reduces the mana cost of every song, but he loses a stack if he misses a beat. Stacks linger for a short duration when Largo's song ends.
lore: The very first Bard Monk played a song that summoned a living island and saved the Murkroot exiles from a salt-worn death.
note: Items can be used while in this mode.
scepter_description: Largo can play two songs per beat by strumming both at the same time. On beats when he strums two songs, Largo deals **50** + **10**/**15**/**20** magic damage per Groovin' stack to nearby enemies.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_TOGGLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_INVISIBLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL

name: largo_song_fight_song
description: Largo plays a song that increases nearby allied heroes' spell amplification and grants their attacks additional magic damage.
lore: 'Hey, when a beach brawl breaks out, you gotta learn to throw your musical weight around or the party's over proper quick.'

name: largo_song_double_time
description: Largo plays a song that increases nearby friendly units' movement speed and grants a brief slow resistance.
lore: 'It's like that old story about the scary swamp witch. You better watch just where you're jumping when you're trying to do it lickety-split.'

name: largo_song_good_vibrations
description: Largo plays a song that heals nearby friendly heroes.
lore: 'If this song can heal an ageless isaloth, it can handle a few cuts and bruises on the lot of you.'

name: largo_encore
description: Buffs that Largo applies to himself or his team have extended duration.
shard_description:
Whenever Largo applies a Unit Target buff to a friendly hero, he also gets the buff.

If Largo targets himself, the buff is also applied to the nearest allied hero within the cast range of the targeted ability.

name: special_bonus_unique_largo_3
localized_name: 1.5% Croak of Genius Max Health DPS

name: special_bonus_unique_largo_4
localized_name: +100 Catchy Lick Cast Range / +50 Pull Distance

name: rattletrap_jetpack_toggle
description: Toggles Jetpack on and off.

name: clinkz_infernal_shred
description:
Clinkz and his skeletons apply a stacking debuff that causes their attacks to pierce up to **20%** of the target's total physical armor (does not reduce their armor).  Clinkz applies **2%** per attack, and skeletons apply **1%**. 

Lasts **5** seconds.

name: spectre_shadow_step
description:
Thrusts an uncontrollable illusion at the target. The illusion receives **200%** damage.

The Reality sub-ability may be used to teleport to the illusion, destroying it.
lore: With great focus of will, Mercurial can sometimes limit the extent of her division.

name: brewmaster_drunken_brawler_brew_up
description: Whenever Brewmaster casts an ability, he becomes Brewed Up and his stance becomes empowered.  If he casts another ability while Brewed Up, the duration is extended.  The cooldown starts when the effect ends.

name: brewmaster_liquid_courage
description: When Brewmaster drops below **50%** Health he gains a Status Resistance buff and his movement speed alternates every **1**s between being faster and being slower. The effect becomes stronger at lower health, scaling from 0 up to max values at **20%** Health.
shard_description:
Toss a strong drink to a teammate or drink it yourself, activating the maximum power effect of Liquid Courage and granting **2%** Max HP Regen per second.

Lasts **5** seconds.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_spirit_link
description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, increasing their movement speed as well as sharing a percentage of their lifesteal with each other.
lore: Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.
note: Break disables the shared lifesteal.

name: lone_druid_entangle
description:
Allows Lone Druid to Entangle enemies once they gain **5** stacks. Entangled enemies are rooted and take damage over time.

When cast, applies **2** stacks to each enemy hero in the area and **5** stacks to enemy creeps. Also empowers Lone Druid for **10**s, making him apply **1** stack with each attack on enemy heroes. Enemies cannot gain stacks while Entangled.

Leveling this ability also levels Spirit Bear's Entangling Claws ability.
note:
Rooted units can't use Blink abilities and are revealed if they are invisible.
Lone Druid's Empowered Buff and enemy stack counter debuff cannot be dispelled.
Entangled debuff is dispellable.
Creeps can't gain stacks from either Lone Druid's or Spirit Bear's attacks, and are Entangled only on cast.
Roshan is affected as if he were a hero.
scepter_description: Entangle applies **5** stacks to enemy heroes in the area and has increased radius. Enemies no longer have protection from gaining stacks while Entangled.

name: special_bonus_unique_lone_druid_spirit_bear_return_cd
localized_name: Return has No Cooldown and -0.5s Channel Time

name: treant_super_bloom
description: Treant grows massive in size for **15** seconds. While enlarged, he gains phased movement with a fixed speed of **310**, **120%** bonus Strength, and a splashing attack that deals **60%** of his attack damage in a **300** unit radius.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Super Bloom.

name: visage_summon_familiars_recall
description: Recall this familiar to Visage after **4**s, during which it cannot attack or act.

name: slark_saltwater_shiv
description: Slark slices the target with his salty shiv, stealing a portion of the target's movement speed, Health Regen and Health Restoration.  This effect stacks.
note: Subsequent use of Saltwater Shiv refreshes the duration of all Shiv stacks.

name: special_bonus_unique_phantom_lancer_illusion_lances
description: Spirit Lances from illusions hit for a percentage of the normal damage amount

name: special_bonus_unique_riki_tricks_dmg
localized_name: 15% of Riki's Base damage added to Tricks of the Trade

name: special_bonus_unique_broodmother_web_speed
localized_name: +14% Spin Web Move Speed and Ignore Speed Limit

name: special_bonus_unique_brewmaster_brewed_up_duration
localized_name: +1s Drunken Brawler Brew Up / Extend Duration

name: special_bonus_unique_lone_druid_entangle_duration
description: Also applies to Spirit Bear's Entangling Claws Root

name: item_tier1_token
description: Activate to redeem a Tier 1 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: item_tier2_token
description: Activate to redeem a Tier 2 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: item_tier3_token
description: Activate to redeem a Tier 3 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: item_tier4_token
description: Activate to redeem a Tier 4 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: item_tier5_token
description: Activate to redeem a Tier 5 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: templar_assassin_hidden_gates
description: Templar Assassin gains access to linked portals at the edges of the map usable only by her.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_INNATE_UI | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_CHANNEL |  DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES

name: miniboss_unyielding_shield
description: Passively grants a regenerating All Damage Barrier. Armor can not go below 0.

name: miniboss_reflect
description: Reflects damage received evenly to the attacker and all other heroes within 1200 radius

name: tinker_keen_teleport
description: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
lore: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE

name: default_attack
description: Damage done by direct attacks.

name: attribute_bonus
description: Improves all attributes per point spent

name: antimage_mana_break
description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt.
lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
note: Mana Break has **50%** effect if caused by illusions.

name: antimage_blink
description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
note: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
scepter_description: After casting Blink, your next Mana Break within **5**s burns an additional **20%** max mana and prevents the target from regenerating or gaining mana for a short duration. This debuff is undispellable. Blink Cooldown reduced by **1**s.

name: antimage_mana_void
description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
note:
Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
Break disables Mana Thirst vision and attack bonuses.

name: axe_berserkers_call
description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
shard_description: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units.

name: axe_battle_hunger
description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The enemy is slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
note: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
shard_description: Multiple instances of Battle Hunger can stack on a single target.

name: axe_counter_helix
description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
note:
Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
Illusions' counters don't increase when they attack when you have a Scepter.
scepter_description: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown and its counter advances when Axe attacks.

name: axe_culling_blade
description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
note: Culling Blade death cannot be prevented with other abilities like Shallow Grave.

name: bane_brain_sap
description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
shard_description: Reduces cooldown by **3**. Causes Brain Sap to become a **550** AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for **30%**.

name: bane_enfeeble
description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.
lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

name: bane_fiends_grip
description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every **0.5** seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
scepter_description: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by **45**. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take **225%** incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

name: bane_nightmare
description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage Nightmared targets freely.
lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
note:
In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
Bane can wake himself from Nightmare.
On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.

name: bloodseeker_bloodrage
description: Drives Bloodseeker or an allied hero into a bloodthirsty rage which causes them to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of their health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
note: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker or allies is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
shard_description: Bloodseeker's Bloodrage attacks now deal **2%** of the target's max health as Pure damage.

name: bloodseeker_blood_bath
description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After **2.9** seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
note: Total time is a **2.6** second delay plus a **0.3** second cast time.

name: bloodseeker_thirst
description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below **100%**, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below **25%**, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
note:
Not triggered by Illusions.
Max movement speed bonus occurs when an enemy's health is at or below **25%**.
Effects linger for **4** seconds if a target dies.

name: bloodseeker_rupture
description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.
scepter_description: Increases initial damage and grants **0** Rupture Charges.

name: drow_ranger_frost_arrows
description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts **1.5** seconds.
lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
note: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.
scepter_description: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.

name: drow_ranger_marksmanship
description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within **325** range.
lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
note: Marksmanship procs have true strike.

name: earthshaker_fissure
description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
note:
Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
shard_description: Reduces Fissure cooldown and releases an Aftershock along its path that stuns for a shortened duration when Earthshaker casts another ability.

name: earthshaker_enchant_totem
description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have **100** bonus attack range on the next attack.
lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
note: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
scepter_description: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.

name: earthshaker_aftershock
description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
note: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

name: earthshaker_echo_slam
description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

name: juggernaut_blade_dance
description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

name: juggernaut_blade_fury
description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage every **0.2**s to nearby enemy units. Applies a strong dispel at the end of the spin.
lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
note:
You can use items during Blade Fury.
Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
shard_description: Increases Blade Fury radius, and slows enemies by **35%**.

name: juggernaut_healing_ward
description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at **325** movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts **25** seconds.
lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
note:
The Healing Ward can be controlled.
Multiple Healing Wards do not stack.

name: juggernaut_omni_slash
description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
note: You can use items during Omnislash.

name: kunkka_torrent
description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
note:
The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies and provides vision in fog of war.
Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

name: kunkka_tidebringer
description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

name: kunkka_x_marks_the_spot
description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
note: Interrupts channeling spells.

name: kunkka_return
description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

name: kunkka_ghostship
description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a strong swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
note:
Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
The boat has a movement speed of **650**.
scepter_description: Ghostship creates a fleet of **2** ships at the target point on a **2.5** second interval. Each ship now also fires **3** waves of cannonballs from the port and starboard side that deal **40%** of Ghostship's damage as they pass through enemies.

name: lina_dragon_slave
description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
note:
Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.
Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

name: lina_light_strike_array
description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
note: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

name: lina_fiery_soul
description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts **18** seconds.
lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
note:
Duration refreshes each time an opponent is hit with a spell.
Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

name: lina_laguna_blade
description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
note: Laguna Blade has a **0.25** delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
shard_description: **100%** of the damage dealt is converted to an all damage barrier for Lina. Barrier lasts for **10**s.

name: lion_impale
description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
note:
The spikes move at **2800** units per second.
Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

name: lion_voodoo
description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
note:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of **120**, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

name: lion_mana_drain
description:
CHANNELED - Channels magical energy, taking mana and slowing enemies over time. If the enemy has no mana remaining, the slow is increased by **15%**. 

 Can target allies to give them mana and movement speed at a **50%** rate.
lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
note: Prevents heroes from going invisible.
shard_description: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to **2** additional enemies and increases break distance. Lion becomes Debuff Immune with **60%** magic resistance while channeling.

name: lion_finger_of_death
description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
note:
Finger of Death has a **0.25** delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
Finger of Death only gains damage if the enemy hero dies within **3** seconds of being affected by Finger of Death.
scepter_description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

name: mirana_arrow
description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from **0.01** to **2.6**/**3.4**/**4.2**/**5** seconds, with bonus damage up to **180** added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
note:
For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
Starstruck does not apply to the second Starstorm from Aghanim's Scepter.
scepter_description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.

name: mirana_leap
description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts **5** seconds.
lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
shard_description: Grants +**1** Leap charge. Attacks during the Leap buff critically strike for **150%** damage.

name: mirana_starfall
description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a **675** radius will be struck a second time.
lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
note:
Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second meteor if the first died before impact.

name: morphling_waveform
description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

name: morphling_adaptive_strike_agi
description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used.

The target is also knocked back and stunned based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum knockback distance and stun is used.
lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
note: Projectile moves at **1150** speed.

name: morphling_morph_agi
description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
note:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.
shard_description: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned. Reduces mana cost.

name: morphling_morph_str
description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
note:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.
shard_description: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned. Reduces mana cost.

name: morphling_replicate
description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
note:
You can't target yourself with Morph.
Morph won't copy Shard/Scepter abilities unless Morphling owns the respective item.
Does not trigger spell reflect.
scepter_description: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.

name: morphling_morph_replicate
description: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

name: nevermore_shadowraze1
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
shard_description: Cooldown reduced by **2**s per enemy hero.

name: nevermore_shadowraze2
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
shard_description: Cooldown reduced by **2**s per enemy hero.

name: nevermore_shadowraze3
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
shard_description: Cooldown reduced by **2**s per enemy hero.

name: nevermore_necromastery
description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. Hero kills grant **4** souls. On death, he releases **30%** of them from bondage.
lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
note:
Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.
scepter_description: Increases max souls.

name: nevermore_dark_lord
description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
note: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.

name: nevermore_requiem
description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for **0.6** seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of **2.15**. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. 

 Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
note:
One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every **1** soul in his possession.
Fear and movement slow do not apply if the Requiem was released on death.
scepter_description: Reduces cooldown and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

name: phantom_lancer_spirit_lance
description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
note: Illusions within **675** range of Phantom Lancer will mimic the cast animation.

name: phantom_lancer_doppelwalk
description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After **1** second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes **500%** bonus damage and deals **-80%** less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
note:
This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispel debuffs.
Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.

name: phantom_lancer_juxtapose
description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for **8** seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last **4** seconds.
lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
shard_description: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to **8** seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by **15%** during this invisibility.

name: puck_illusory_orb
description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
note:
The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

name: puck_ethereal_jaunt
description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
lore: The Orb is an egg of potential, traveling along its own timeline.

name: puck_waning_rift
description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

name: puck_phase_shift
description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
note:
Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
shard_description: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range every time it phase shifts.

name: puck_dream_coil
description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
scepter_description: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked at a rate equal to **90%** of Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.

name: pudge_flesh_heap
description: Pudge covers himself with a layer of flesh that blocks damage of any type taken from any source.
lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

name: pudge_meat_hook
description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
note:
Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
Meat Hook hits invisible units.
Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, ancient units and Roshan.
Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
Meat Hook can hit and drag runes to Pudge, refunding the Hook's mana cost.
shard_description:
When Meat Hook hits an enemy, it deals bonus damage based on the distance pulled.

When Meat Hook hits an ally, Meat Hook's cooldown is reduced by **50%**.

name: pudge_rot
description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
note:
Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.
Rot hits invisible units.
If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
Rot self-damage is non-lethal.
scepter_description: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy Health Restoration.

name: pudge_dismember
description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of **75** units, up to a minimum of **125** range.
lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
note: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

name: shadow_shaman_ether_shock
description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
note: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

name: shadow_shaman_voodoo
description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
note:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of **100**, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

name: shadow_shaman_shackles
description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
scepter_description: Increase cast range. Every **0.9** seconds, shackled units emit a radial Ether Shock hitting all other units within **600** of the target for **100%** of Ether Shock's normal damage. Shackles can now also be cast on allies and Mass Serpent Wards that stay within **2000** units of Shadow Shaman. Allied units are not disabled by Shackle.

name: shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward
description: Summons **10** Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. Creeps deal half damage to the Serpent Ward.
lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.

name: razor_plasma_field
description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

name: razor_static_link
description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
note: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes **250** units greater than Static Link's cast range.
shard_description: Increases Cast Range. Slows Razor's target by **1**x the amount of damage stolen while the link is active.

name: razor_unstable_current
description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed by **1%** per hero level.

name: razor_eye_of_the_storm
description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at the enemy unit with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing armor.
lore: Ride the lightning.
note:
Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
Eye of the Storm will prioritize striking static linked heroes.
Successive casts of Eye of the Storm will stack.
scepter_description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

name: skeleton_king_hellfire_blast
description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

name: skeleton_king_bone_guard
description: Gains a Charge for every 2 creeps killed and 2 charges per hero killed. Activate to spend all charges, summoning skeletons that respawn once when killed. Skeletons benefit from Vampiric Spirit's lifesteal.
lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
note:
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Casting Wraithfire Blast on an enemy causes the skeletons to attack that enemy.

name: skeleton_king_mortal_strike
description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
lore: One blow to crush a foe.
shard_description: Mortal Strike deals **50%** bonus damage when in Wraith form.

name: skeleton_king_reincarnation
description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a **600** radius are slowed. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.
lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
note:
Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
scepter_description: Reduces cooldown.
shard_description: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost.

name: death_prophet_carrion_swarm
description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
note:
Can hit units up to 1110 range away.
Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.

name: death_prophet_silence
description: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
note: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

name: death_prophet_witchcraft
description: Death Prophet's occult knowledge deepens with experience, gaining movement speed and spell cooldown reduction.

name: death_prophet_exorcism
description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts **40** seconds.
lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
note:
Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
scepter_description: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.

name: sven_storm_bolt
description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
note: Aghanim's Scepter upgrade does not allow Storm Hammer to target invulnerable targets.
scepter_description: Increases cast range, projectile speed and applies a basic dispel to affected enemies. Allows Storm Hammer to affect invulnerable enemies in the radius. If alt-cast, it deals an additional **180** damage and Sven travels with the Storm Hammer.

name: sven_great_cleave
description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

name: sven_warcry
description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts **8** seconds.
lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
shard_description: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants **6** armor to all allies near Sven. Increases active movement speed bonus.

name: sven_gods_strength
description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for **30** seconds.
lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
note: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.

name: storm_spirit_static_remnant
description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts **12** seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
note:
Remnants take **0.75** second to materialize after the spell is cast.
Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
The explosion actually hits units in a **300** radius, but will only be triggered in **235**.
Can be self-cast to cast in place.

name: storm_spirit_electric_vortex
description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
scepter_description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

name: storm_spirit_overload
