Summons dark energies around an ally unit, dispelling them and creating an all damage barrier that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the barrier is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.
note:
The max damage is always dealt whether the barrier is destroyed by expiring or absorbing damage.
The explosion does not damage units hidden by the fog of war.
shard_description: **75%** of absorbed damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

name: abaddon_frostmourne
description: Abaddon strikes an enemy, affecting them by a chilling curse, slowing them, causing them to take damage over time, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost. Damage over time component to buildings is reduced by **100%**.
lore: While the baptized draw strength from the Font, the gifts of Avernus are debilitating to the uninitiated.

name: abaddon_borrowed_time
description:
When activated, dispels you and all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below **400**.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.
note:
Borrowed Time can be manually activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.  The passive activation can still occur while silenced.
Aphotic Shield does not block any damage to Abaddon when Borrowed Time is active, allowing him to heal.
Break prevents Borrowed Time from automatically activating.
scepter_description: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than **550** damage while within Mist Coil's cast range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

name: elder_titan_echo_stomp
description: CHANNELED - Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.
lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
note: If a unit is hit by Astral Spirit and Elder Titan, they will take both instances of damage.
shard_description: Lowers Cooldown. Echo Stomp may be placed on alt-cast to allow Elder Titan to take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

name: elder_titan_echo_stomp_spirit
description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.
lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.

name: elder_titan_return_spirit
description: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_PSEUDO_QUEUE

name: elder_titan_natural_order
description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
note: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.

name: elder_titan_earth_splitter
description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.
lore: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.

name: legion_commander_overwhelming_odds
description: Turns the foes' numbers against them, dealing damage to all enemies in the area. Damage increases with each enemy unit or hero in the area. Also grants bonus Attack Speed to Legion Commander. Can be cast during Duel.
lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
shard_description: Gives **100** bonus radius when cast during Duel.

name: legion_commander_press_the_attack
description:
Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus movement speed and health regen for a short time.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.

name: legion_commander_moment_of_courage
description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.

name: legion_commander_duel
description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities, with the exception of Legion Commander being able to cast Overwhelming Odds. If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
note: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
scepter_description: Increases Duel duration.  Legion Commander is debuff immune for the duration of the Duel.
shard_description: Increases Duel damage by **5** per win. Applies retroactively.

name: techies_land_mines
description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active **500** AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for **1** seconds dealing damage and temporarily reducing the enemy's Magic Resistance. The explosion deals full damage if the target is within **150** radius and decreases up to **60%** on the edge. Deals **30%** damage to buildings.
lore: The bane of Toterin!
note:
Cannot be placed within **350** AoE of another Proximity Mine.
Proximity Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.
Mines are triggered by invisible units.
Grants 30 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.

name: techies_stasis_trap
description: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.
lore: The scourge of Trapper Town!
note:
Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.
Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.
Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
scepter_description: Increases cast range.

name: techies_suicide
description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and stun enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies non-lethal damage equal to a percentage of their current health.
lore: Where we going?
note:
The self-damage Techies receive from this blast is pure and non-lethal.
This ability destroys trees.

name: techies_remote_mines
description: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.
lore: The downfall of Dredger's Bight!
note: Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
scepter_description: Increases damage and cast range.

name: ember_spirit_searing_chains
description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
lore: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
note:
Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
Does not affect Debuff Immune or invisible units.

name: ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist
description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes.
lore: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
note:
Targets are determined when the spell is cast.
A regular attack is done to each target every **0.25** seconds.
Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.
Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.

name: ember_spirit_flame_guard
description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken. Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active. If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
lore: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
note:
Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.
The damage lingers for an additional **0.5** seconds after application.

name: ember_spirit_fire_remnant
description: Sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at **250%** Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit will dash out to all active Fire Remnants, destroying them and dealing damage in an area and then moving to the nearest Remnant.  Ember Spirit will end at the Remnant closest to the targeted location.
lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
note: Starts with 3 charges (maximum).
scepter_description: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.
shard_description: If an enemy hero dies near Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

name: ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant
description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
lore: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!

name: earth_spirit_boulder_smash
description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit in a **200** radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.
lore: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.

name: earth_spirit_rolling_boulder
description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a **0.6**s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing **60**/**70**/**80**/**90** + **100%** STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
lore: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
note:
Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.
The boulder has a radius of **160**.
Earth Spirit is untargetable and invulnerable while rolling.

name: earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip
description:
Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant or Allied Unit. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced.

Pulled Remnants also deal damage to struck enemies.

Cast range is reduced when targeting an ally.
lore: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.
note:
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Geomagnetic Grip can also target allied creeps.
shard_description: Decreases cooldown to **10**s and increases allied unit cast range and pull speed.

name: earth_spirit_magnetize
description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
lore: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.

name: abyssal_underlord_firestorm
description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
lore: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.
shard_description: Firestorm can be allied targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows the hero around.  The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

name: abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice
description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be damaged and rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected by the root only every **3.6** seconds.
lore: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.
scepter_description: Increases radius of the Pit of Malice.

name: abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura
description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.
lore: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.
note: Break disables the Attack Damage Reduction aura and prevents Underlord from gaining new stacks.

name: terrorblade_reflection
description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes have movement and attack speeds slowed and attacked by their reflection.
lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
note:
Reflections are untargetable, invulnerable illusions, that will be destroyed if the slow debuff is removed.
Reflections can only attack their source.

name: terrorblade_conjure_image
description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrorblades!
note: Illusions created by Conjure Image are visually different for enemies.

name: terrorblade_metamorphosis
description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within **1200** range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
note: Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Terrorblade was in when the item was used.

name: terrorblade_sunder
description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
note: Debuff Immune enemies don't get their HP modified.

name: phoenix_icarus_dive
description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
note: Icarus Dive has a **2** second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

name: phoenix_icarus_dive_stop
description: Immediately cancels the dive.
lore: SCREE!

name: phoenix_fire_spirits
description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
note: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.

name: phoenix_sun_ray
description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
note:
Sun Ray has a width of **130** units, and a length of **1200** units.
Sun Ray is canceled if Phoenix gets stunned, silenced, cycloned, hexed or slept.
Phoenix can use items and abilities without canceling Sun Ray.
shard_description: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova, and slows affected enemies by **10%**.

name: phoenix_sun_ray_stop
description: Immediately stops the Sun Ray.
lore: CHIRP!

name: phoenix_sun_ray_toggle_move
description: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.
lore: SQAWRK!
note: Sun Ray allows Phoenix to move over cliffs and trees.

name: phoenix_supernova
description:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After **6** seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
scepter_description: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

name: phoenix_launch_fire_spirit
description: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
lore: PKAWW! BOOM
note: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.

name: drow_ranger_wave_of_silence
description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back and reveals invisible enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow.
lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

name: techies_focused_detonate
description: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.
lore: Why light one fuse when you can light them all?

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES

name: techies_remote_mines_self_detonate
description: Detonate all selected remote mines.
lore: Kablooey!

name: oracle_fortunes_end
description:
CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and dispels enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only dispel debuffs. The root duration increases with channeling time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.
note: Affects invulnerable units.

name: oracle_fates_edict
description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them **100%** magic damage resistance.
lore: An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...

name: oracle_purifying_flames
description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.
lore: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
note:
The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.
The damage from Purifying Flames cannot be lethal to allies.

name: oracle_false_promise
description:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is amplified. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
note:
Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.
scepter_description: Causes False Promise to have a **0.15** second fade delay invisibility and grants the ally **30%** bonus Spell Damage and **0.25** reduced Base Attack Time.

name: tusk_launch_snowball
description: Launch the snowball toward the target.
lore: Into the great wide white!
note:
The snowball destroys trees.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage.

name: broodmother_spin_web_destroy
description: Destroys the selected Spin Web.

name: techies_minefield_sign
description: Plant a warning sign, causing Sticky Bombs and Proximity Mines within its radius to be invulnerable and deal **15%** more damage. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts **60** seconds.
lore: Watch your step!
scepter_description: Increases radius and duration of Minefield Sign. When an enemy hero walks within **200** units of a minefield sign, the **1000** units area around the sign will become a minefield for **10** seconds, dealing damage to enemy units any time they move within its area. Minefield Sign is destroyed after this effect ends.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING

name: earth_spirit_petrify
description:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>
Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.
Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.
lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
note: Earth Spirit himself can be targeted by Boulder Smash if he is enchanted.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Enchant Remnant.

name: treant_eyes_in_the_forest
description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. The eyes last for **300** seconds and are invisible, but are destroyed if their host tree is destroyed or if they are attacked directly.
lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
note:
Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes in the Forest does damage.
If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Eyes In The Forest.

name: winter_wyvern_arctic_burn
description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of **4%**/**6%**/**8%**/**10%** of their current health each second.
lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
note:
Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
This ability does not affect Roshan.
Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to **0.1**.
The damage and slow from Arctic Burn can be dispelled.
scepter_description: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.

name: winter_wyvern_splinter_blast
description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward a unit. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a **500** base radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by **28%**/**32%**/**36%**/**40%**.
lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
note:
The primary projectile moves at **1200** movement speed.
The primary projectile cannot be disjointed and cannot be targeted towards Winter Wyvern herself.

name: winter_wyvern_cold_embrace
description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
shard_description: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within **1150** range. Reduces cooldown by **4** seconds.

name: winter_wyvern_winters_curse
description: Winter Wyvern dispells then freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of damage from Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.
lore: The oldest of the bookwurm's spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
note:
If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.

name: granite_golem_hp_aura
description: Increases the health capacity of nearby units.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED

name: nyx_assassin_burrow
description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mind Flare and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx Assassin gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
note: Casting Vendetta will cancel burrow.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Burrow.

name: mud_golem_rock_destroy
description: On death, Mud Golems shatter into several Shard Golems.

name: mud_golem_hurl_boulder
description: Hurls a boulder at the target, damaging and stunning them.
lore: "Why do they hesitate? What are they afraid of throwing?"

name: life_stealer_assimilate
scepter_description: Adds new ability: life_stealer_assimilate.

name: tusk_walrus_kick
description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within **250** radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by **50%** if kicking a creep.
lore: Tusk may have made his name with his fists, but the wise enemy is wary of any and all limbs.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Walrus Kick.

name: nyx_assassin_unburrow
description: Emerge from the burrow.
lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

name: arc_warden_flux
description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, dealing damage over time and slowing the target. The damage is not applied if another enemy unit is near the target.
lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.
scepter_description: Flux silences when the target is alone, deals more damage, and lasts longer.

name: arc_warden_magnetic_field
description: Arc Warden generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy. The magnetic field grants bonus attack speed and protects allied units within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
lore: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.

name: arc_warden_spark_wraith
description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.
lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
note: Spark Wraiths can not be disjointed.
shard_description: When Spark Wraith activates, a secondary Spark Wraith will fuse to the next closest target that deals **80%** damage. Increases Spark Wraith search radius.

name: black_dragon_dragonhide_aura
description: The Ancient Black Dragon's dreaded presence grants nearby allies additional armor. This bonus can stack with itself.

name: big_thunder_lizard_wardrums_aura
description: The rhythm of the Thunderhide's heartbeat increases the attack speed and accuracy of nearby allies.

name: arc_warden_tempest_double
description:
Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and special Tempest Double versions of his spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.

The Tempest Double loses its sense of self and fractures over time, becoming slower and less accurate.
lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
note: Tempest Double and Refresher Orb cannot be used by the duplicate.

name: obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium
description: Passively grants a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
lore: The Outworld is awash in arcane energy, inclined to diffuse through any of Harbinger's rifts.
note: Break prevents the Aghanim's Scepter effect from triggering.
scepter_description: Damage that would bring Outworld Destroyer below **20%** health triggers a strong dispel. In addition, when the effect is triggered Outworld Destroyer consumes of all his mana to create an all damage barrier equal to **65%** of his maximum mana that lasts for **15** seconds. This effect can occur every **80** seconds and cannot be refreshed.

name: death_prophet_spirit_siphon
description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.
lore: Krobelus willingly shows others the path she alone cannot follow.
note: Cannot cast multiple on same target.
shard_description: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by **1** and causes enemies to be feared for **1** seconds if they are siphoned for **3** seconds consecutively.

name: lone_druid_savage_roar_bear
description: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by **20%**.
note:
An entangled hero will not be able to move.
Cooldown is shared with Lone Druid.

name: mudgolem_cloak_aura
description: This creature protects its allies with a Magic resistance aura. Creeps are better protected.

name: black_dragon_fireball
description: Hurls a fire blast on the ground, igniting the area in a **300** radius for **8**/**9**/**10**/**12** seconds. Enemies caught in the fire will take **85** damage per second.

name: invoker_attribute_bonus
description: Improves all attributes per point spent

name: faceless_void_time_dilation
description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for **7**/**8**/**9**/**10** seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by **4%**/**5%**/**6%**/**7%**, amplified by each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown.
lore: For those facing off against Darkterror, each moment seems to stretch into eternity.
note: Does not affect item cooldowns.

name: monkey_king_boundless_strike
description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with bonus damage and a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
lore: The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
note: Does not affect spell-immune enemies.
shard_description: Boundless Strike applies Primal Spring with **35%** of the max channeling duration power to enemies along the staff and at the end of the staff. When Boundless Strike is set to alt-cast, Monkey King leaps to the end of his staff.

name: monkey_king_mischief
description: Changes Monkey King's shape to deceive opponents, using the environment nearby as inspiration for the disguise. Taking damage, attacking, or using any item or ability breaks Monkey King's disguise. Grants damage immunity for **0.1** seconds upon transforming.
lore: Watch out for that tree.

name: monkey_king_tree_dance
description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for **3** seconds. Taking damage while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
lore: Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
note:
Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
Right-clicking the ground will have Monkey King drop from the tree.
Movement is interrupted if Monkey King is stunned, hexed or banished.

name: monkey_king_untransform
description: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.

name: monkey_king_jingu_mastery
description: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns **4** charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
lore: Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
note:
Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
Repeatedly hitting an enemy refreshes the Jingu Mastery debuff duration.
Hit charges on enemies cannot be dispelled.
Jingu Mastery buff on self can be dispelled.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.

name: monkey_king_primal_spring
description: CHANNELED - Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.
lore: Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_OVERSHOOT

name: monkey_king_wukongs_command
description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.
lore: Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
note:
Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
Soldiers do not copy Basher or Abyssal.
scepter_description: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.

name: elder_titan_natural_order_spirit
description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
note:
When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
Break disables the armor reduction aura.

name: muerta_dead_shot
description:
Muerta fires a ghostly trickshot at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes, it damages and briefly slows, then ricochets in the targeted direction.

The ricochet damages all units that it passes through, stopping when it hits a hero. Heroes hit by the ricochet are feared away from the impact.
lore: A steady gunhand and an eternity of practice produce trickshots that defy the mortal mind.
note:
Feared enemies are phased and unslowable.
The ricochet will travel **1.5**x Dead Shot's cast range.
Can ricochet off of magic immune targets.
scepter_description: Dead Shot damage is increased. Dead Shot expands after it ricochets and pierces through enemy heroes as it fears them.

name: muerta_the_calling
description: Summons a group of **4** revenants that slowly circle the targeted location. Enemies within the area are slowed. Revenants deal damage and silence enemies as they pass through them.
lore: Muerta's family are forever beyond the spirit veil, but her deal with Death allows her to briefly call on them in times of want or need.

name: muerta_gunslinger
description: Toggleable. When toggled on, Muerta's attacks have a chance to fire a second shot at another target.
lore: Muerta offers all of her victims Mercy. Some are fortunate enough to also earn Grace.
note:
If no other units are in range, she fires both guns at the original target.
Secondary shots can hit units within Muerta's attack range plus **175**.
The secondary shot can trigger attack modifiers.
Prioritizes heroes, then non-hero units, then buildings.

name: muerta_pierce_the_veil
description:
Muerta transforms, becoming immune to physical damage. All of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage and Muerta gains bonus attack damage and phased movement.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Muerta sheds her corporeal form, crossing the spirit veil and striking her enemies with the fury of the damned.
note:
Muerta will dodge projectiles upon transformation.
Muerta cannot attack buildings while transformed.
shard_description:
Muerta gains **30%** Spell Lifesteal during Pierce the Veil.
While Pierce the Veil is active Muerta permanently gains **2%** spell amplification each time she kills an enemy Hero or they die in her vicinity. Bonus applies retroactively.

name: special_bonus_unique_pudge_1
localized_name: 1.5x Flesh Heap and Meat Shield bonuses

name: special_bonus_unique_visage_1
localized_name: +1 Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars
description: This effect can stack among multiple sources and lasts **10**s.

name: special_bonus_unique_warlock_1
localized_name: 25% Damage Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

name: special_bonus_unique_vengeful_spirit_3
localized_name: Magic Missile Damage Becomes Pure And Pierces Debuff Immunity

name: special_bonus_unique_jakiro
description: Increases both stun and path duration.

name: special_bonus_unique_doom_1
localized_name: +2.5% Infernal Blade Max HP As Damage

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_2
description: Releases **11** additional Deafening Blasts around Invoker in a circular pattern.  An enemy can only be hit once per cast.

name: spawnlord_aura
description: Gives lifesteal and health regeneration to nearby allies.

name: special_bonus_unique_lion
description: Automatically targets additional enemy units with a mana pool within 400 distance around the original target.

name: special_bonus_unique_medusa
description: The duration of the stun is not affected.

name: special_bonus_unique_phantom_assassin
description: Launches two extra Stifling Daggers towards random visible enemies within the cast range.

name: special_bonus_unique_riki_2
localized_name: +%bonus_agility_pct% Tricks of the Trade Agility Increase

name: special_bonus_unique_bloodseeker
localized_name: -0.7% Bloodrage Max Health DPS For Allies

name: special_bonus_unique_clinkz_2
note: Only steals the first ability

name: special_bonus_unique_leshrac_2
localized_name: Lightning Storm Can Bounce Twice On Units
description: Will bounce to units it affected already only when there are no other units available

name: special_bonus_unique_mirana_2
description: The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, **25** degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.

name: special_bonus_unique_chen_1
localized_name: +%bonus_AbilityCharges% Holy Persuasion Max Units and Charges

name: special_bonus_unique_chen_2
localized_name: Hand of God Fully Heals Chen and His Creeps
description: Initial Heal fully heals. Heal over time is still applied.

name: special_bonus_unique_lone_druid_1
description: Also applies to Spirit Bear's Entangling Claws Root

name: spawnlord_master_stomp
description: Stomps the ground, dealing damage to nearby units and reducing their base physical armor by **50%**.

name: spawnlord_master_freeze
description: Causes the next attack to petrify the enemy, rooting them and dealing **100** damage per second.

name: special_bonus_unique_witch_doctor_2
localized_name: +1% Target Max Health Voodoo Restoration Heal

name: special_bonus_unique_centaur_1
description: Allied heroes within 1200 range of Centaur gain the Return Damage aspect of Retaliate.

name: zuus_cloud
description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
lore: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.
note:
Grants **125** gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Affects the closest enemy unit with strikes from Zeus's current level of Lightning Bolt.
Towers and creeps do half damage to the Nimbus.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Nimbus.

name: dark_willow_bramble_maze
description: Dark Willow creates a **500** AoE maze of **8** brambles that grow in the target area after **0.3** seconds. Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time. Lasts **12** seconds.
lore: The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...
note: Does not interrupt channeling spells upon rooting.

name: dark_willow_bedlam
description: Dark Willow sends her pet wisp to roam around herself for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
lore: You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.

name: dark_willow_shadow_realm
description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has **600** bonus attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after **3** seconds.
lore: What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.
note:
Disjoints projectiles upon cast.
Grants phased movement.
Spells which require vision cannot affect Dark Willow in the Shadow Realm.
scepter_description: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

name: dark_willow_cursed_crown
description: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.
lore: Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...
shard_description: Cursed Crown creates **4** brambles in a **175** radius around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Cursed Crown cooldown reduced by 1.5 seconds.

name: pangolier_gyroshell
description:
Pangolier curls into a debuff immune ball with **60%** additional magic resistance and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage proportional to his attack damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...
note:
Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.
If Pangolier is disabled while rolling, he will continue to stun and knock enemies that come within range.
It takes Pangolier **1**s to reach full roll speed.

name: pangolier_swashbuckle
description:
Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes and briefly slows all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.

Lucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.
lore: The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.
note: Casting Swashbuckle during Rolling Thunder ends Rolling Thunder.

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_2
localized_name: -0.1s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval

name: special_bonus_unique_windranger_2
localized_name: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 18s
description: Triggers if Focus Fired unit dies, regardless of killer.

name: pangolier_gyroshell_stop
description: Halt!
lore: Donté Panlin stops when he pleases.

name: pangolier_shield_crash
description:
Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position damaging all enemies in a radius. Pangolier gains an all damage barrier for a short time if Shield Crash hits an enemy hero.

Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.
lore: Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.
scepter_description: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero that deals **75%** damage.

name: void_spirit_dissimilate
description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
lore: Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.
note: Call of the Void will never spawn Aether Remnants in the Outer Ring.

name: snapfire_scatterblast
description: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Damage, Movement Slow, Attack Slow and Slow Duration are increased by **50%** for enemies caught at point-blank range.
lore: A favorite from her collection, Beadie crafted Ol' Rackatee as her first line of defense when she ventured into the Outlands.

name: snapfire_mortimer_kisses
description: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over **5.5** seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of **600**. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.
lore: Little did Beadie know when she adopted Mortimer, dragon toads--which aren't even toads at all--share more than just a name with their distant draconic cousins.
note:
Can be cancelled by pressing Stop, Hold Position, or using another ability.
Has a minimum travel time of **0.8** and maximum travel time of **2**.

name: snapfire_firesnap_cookie
description: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.
lore: With the help of a secret mixture that pairs Beadie's baking skills with her passion for black powder, these battle biscuits pack a punch.
note: The cookie projectile has a speed of **1200**.
shard_description: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, healing the target and launching a Mortimer Kiss that does **40%** impact damage to the landing destination.

name: snapfire_gobble_up
description: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to %max_time_in_belly% seconds.
lore: SHLORP!
note: Snapfire earns the creep's bounty after it has been spat out and died.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Gobble Up.

name: snapfire_spit_creep
description: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit based on the current level of Mortimer Kisses, that slows and applies damage over time. Spit Out has a no minimum launch range.
lore: SPITTOOO!
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Spit Out.

name: snapfire_lil_shredder
description: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire **5** attacks dealing fixed damage plus a percentage of her attack damage. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.
lore: Beadie constantly tinkers with a design she first dreamed up plotting an exodus from her old gang.
note:
Sets base attack time to **1**s for the duration.
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Lil' Shredder attacks.

name: grimstroke_soul_chain
description: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
lore: The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
note:
If bound to another unit, affected units are leashed and prevented from blinking.
Provides vision of both leashed units.

name: mars_gods_rebuke
description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.
lore: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.
note: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on God's Rebuke attacks.

name: special_bonus_unique_lina_4
localized_name: 5% Fiery Soul Magic Resist Per Stack

name: special_bonus_unique_earth_spirit_2
description: Applies Magnetize at its current duration to enemy Heroes around Earth Spirit, and can be refreshed with Stone Remnants.

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_2
localized_name: +30 Damage to Beastmaster and his summons

name: special_bonus_unique_visage_3
description: A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.

name: special_bonus_unique_jakiro_3
localized_name: +3% Liquid Frost and Fire Max Health Damage
description: Deals +**3%** of the target's max health as damage. This damage does not apply to Buildings.

name: elder_titan_move_spirit
description: Moves the Astral Spirit to target location.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_PSEUDO_QUEUE

name: special_bonus_unique_wraith_king_4
description: Instead of being slowed, all enemy units within 900 range have the current level of Wraithfire Blast cast on them when Reincarnation triggers.

name: mars_bulwark
description:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

 Can be toggled, granting phased movement, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs **70%** of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.
lore: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.
note:
Redirect only works if the projectile targets are in a cone behind Mars or within 100 range of him.
Break disables the front and side damage reduction.
scepter_description: Creates **4** invulnerable soldiers on both sides of Mars front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage, knock back and slow approaching enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

name: mars_spear
description: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
lore: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.
note:
Spear of Mars can hit invisible units and reveals them if they are stunned.
Spear of Mars will only pin a unit to cliffs onto elevated areas, otherwise it will push them off onto lower ground.
shard_description: Spear of Mars impales up to **2** heroes and leaves a fire trail behind that deals damage over time and slows movement speed.

name: special_bonus_unique_abaddon_3
localized_name: +65 Curse of Avernus Attack Speed Bonus

name: special_bonus_unique_alchemist_3
localized_name: Acid Spray grants armor to allies

name: special_bonus_unique_brewmaster_4
localized_name: Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited
description: Lasts **1.5** seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_clinkz_3
description: A Searing Arrows attack will send another arrow into a random enemy within Clinkz's attack range.

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_4
description: Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a %cooldown% second cooldown. Creates %value% visible Sun Strikes within %min_range%-%max_range% range of each enemy hero.

name: special_bonus_unique_lone_druid_7
localized_name: +%bonus_bonus_bear_hp% True Form and Spirit Bear Health

name: special_bonus_unique_morphling_3
description: Additional enemy units within cast range are also targeted by Adaptive Strike.

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_2
localized_name: +100 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_outworld_devourer_3
localized_name: +0.8% of Current Mana as Movement Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_medusa_4
description: Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.

name: special_bonus_unique_wisp_4
description: While tethered to a friendly Hero, each time that Hero attacks, Io will attack the same target automatically.

name: special_bonus_unique_axe_3
localized_name: +%bonus_armor_per_stack% Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack

name: special_bonus_unique_bane_4
description: Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.

name: special_bonus_unique_morphling_4
localized_name: +75% Waveform Attack Damage And Applies On Hit Effects

name: special_bonus_unique_puck_3
description: Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every %value% seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_4
localized_name: 450 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
description: Every **450** distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.

name: special_bonus_unique_wisp_5
description: While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim's Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.

name: tiny_toss_tree
description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.
shard_description: Increases damage dealt by thrown trees by **100**.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_4
description: Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_5
description: Enemies hit by the split of Psi Blades have their movement speed slowed by %value% for %value2% second.

name: special_bonus_unique_tidehunter_4
localized_name: +%bonus_bonus_reduction_per_stack% Kraken Shell Damage Block per Anchor Smash Kill
description: Retroactively counts any hero who died with Anchor Smash debuff.

name: special_bonus_unique_timbersaw_2
localized_name: +6 Max / +1 Hero Attack Reactive Armor Stacks

name: special_bonus_unique_troll_warlord_4
description: Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.

name: special_bonus_unique_tusk_4
description: Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.

name: special_bonus_unique_oracle_4
description: The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).

name: special_bonus_unique_venomancer_5
localized_name: Noxious Plague Aura reduces 200 Attack Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_winter_wyvern_4
description: The slow is still applied for the same duration.

name: special_bonus_unique_faceless_void_4
description: Grants a **20%** chance to avoid damage entirely. Disabled by break.

name: special_bonus_unique_tiny_5
description: Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.

name: special_bonus_unique_omniknight_4
localized_name: +75% Hammer of Purity Bonus Base Damage

name: special_bonus_unique_monkey_king_6
description: Creates an additional ring of **7** soldiers at **1100** range from the center.

name: special_bonus_unique_dark_seer_4
description: A second Wall of Replica is created %value% units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.

name: special_bonus_unique_silencer_5
localized_name: +40s Glaives of Wisdom Int Steal Duration

name: special_bonus_unique_luna_5
localized_name: Lucent Beam Hits An Additional Target
description: Random target within **500** range of the primary target.

name: special_bonus_unique_shadow_demon_6
localized_name: Soul Catcher Creates 2 Illusion On Death

name: special_bonus_unique_meepo_4
localized_name: Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets

name: visage_stone_form_self_cast
description:
Orders the Familiar closest to Visage to cast Stone Form in its current location, turning into stone and smashing into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After **6** seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.

 Can be alt-cast to order the closest Familiar to the target location to move there and cast Stone Form.
lore: There is no weapon or spell devised that can mar the wroughtstone servants of death.
note: While Stone Form is not dispellable, the stun can be removed by strong dispels.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_PSEUDO_QUEUE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ALT_CASTABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar
description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk
description: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every **4**s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
shard_description: Increases Hawk duration by **5**s and summons an additional Hawk.

name: grimstroke_return
description: Triggers an existing Ink Swell.

name: huskar_inner_fire
description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and silencing them.
lore: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.
shard_description: Lowers Inner Fire cooldown and causes it to apply a movement speed slow and heal Huskar for a percentage of the damage dealt to enemies.

name: spirit_breaker_bulldoze
description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
lore: Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.

name: chen_divine_favor
description:
Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration. Can be cast on allies to provide them with bonus armor and increasing the healing and health regeneration they receive.

If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen receive the buff and will be teleported to him. Taking damage from enemy heroes or their units will cancel the teleport.
lore: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.

name: pangolier_lucky_shot
description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to drastically slow their attack speed and reduce armor on any damage dealt by Pangolier's attacks or abilities.
lore: The Pangolier's blade is guided more often by whim than reason.

name: lone_druid_spirit_link
description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, increasing their movement speed as well as sharing a percentage of their lifesteal with each other.
lore: Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.
note: Break disables the shared lifesteal.

name: brewmaster_cinder_brew
description:
Rolls a barrel of ale at enemies that damages enemies along its path and spills out at the target location.

Any enemy in the path or the spill area is drenched in cinder brew, becoming slowed.  If the enemy receives Magic or Pure damage, they will be ignited, extending the duration by **3**s and causing them to take damage over time.
lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

name: antimage_counterspell
description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and reflects any targeted spells.
lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.
note: Break disables the passive magic resistance.
shard_description: Creates a blinked fragment of Anti-Mage next to the enemy caster upon reflecting their unit-targeted spell while active.

name: keeper_of_the_light_will_o_wisp
description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
lore: Though he would not claim to 'know' them, Ezalor holds an uncanny influence over many powerful creatures always willing to come to his aid.
note: Ignus Fatuus applies a non-interrupting pull towards it on all enemies within the radius.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Will-O-Wisp.

name: meepo_ransack
description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
lore: So you gonna need that, or...?
note: Amount healed is amplified by Lifesteal Amplification

name: clinkz_burning_army
description: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.
lore: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Burning Army.

name: rubick_arcane_supremacy
description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.
lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
note:
Break disables the gaining of new Arcane Accumulation stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing Arcane Accumulation stacks.

name: tusk_tag_team
description: Activate to temporarily apply a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts **6** seconds.
lore: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.
note: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.

name: lich_sinister_gaze
description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.
lore: Mind the cold...
scepter_description: Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of **400** in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.

name: ancient_apparition_ice_age
shard_description: Adds new ability: ancient_apparition_ice_age.

name: void_spirit_aether_remnant
description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
lore: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.
shard_description: Creates an additional watcher path that rotates around the remnant.  The remnant now provides True Sight, and no longer triggers on creeps, instead dealing **50%** damage to them every second in both paths.

name: void_spirit_astral_step
description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for **1.25** seconds and then detonates.
lore: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.
note: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.

name: void_spirit_resonant_pulse
description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.
scepter_description: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain %max_charges% charges.

name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_8
description: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.

name: primal_beast_rock_throw
description:
Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast. After landing, the rock splits into 3 additional fragments that land behind the initial target location.

 Rock Throw increases stacks of Uproar for each hero hit.
lore: AGAIN WITH THE ROCKS!
shard_description: Adds new ability: Rock Throw.

name: special_bonus_unique_primal_beast_roar_dispells
localized_name: Beast dispels himself when activating Uproar

name: seasonal_throw_snowball
description: Throw a snowball at an ally or enemy.
lore: Hand crafted at the perfect temperature.

name: seasonal_summon_snowman
description: Construct a jolly snowman.
lore: He'll stay friends as long as he can.

name: seasonal_decorate_tree
description: Give any tree a delightfully seasonal touch.
lore: Festive trappings for even the bloodiest of battlefields.

name: seasonal_festive_firework
description: Shoot a firework into the air.
lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

name: seasonal_summon_penguin
description: Summon a friendly penguin who slides around. Each time a hero bumps the penguin, it gains speed and lasts a bit longer.
lore: Nothing gets age-old enemies to set aside their differences quite like a penguin to play with.
note: Your team's penguins will pass through enemy heroes that you don't have vision of.

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl10_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl15_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl20_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl25_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl10_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl15_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl20_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl25_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: invoker_cold_snap_ad
description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases as the level goes up.
lore: Sadron's Protracted Frisson.
note: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than **10** after reductions.

name: invoker_ghost_walk_ad
description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies, and slows Invoker as well based on the level.
lore: Myrault's Hinder-Gast.
note: The slow effect does not work on Debuff Immune enemies.

name: invoker_tornado_ad
description:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level and holds enemies in the air for a duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Claws of Tornarus.
note: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.

name: invoker_emp_ad
description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after **2.9** seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
lore: Endoleon's Malevolent Perturbation.
note: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).
shard_description: Increases damage for each point of mana drained by EMP and pulls enemy units into the EMP's center at **175** units per second.

name: invoker_alacrity_ad
description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed and their damage.
lore: Gaster's Mandate of Impetuous Strife.

name: invoker_sun_strike_ad
description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
lore: Harlek's Incantation of Incineration.
note:
Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.
scepter_description: Adds Cataclysm. Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a **90** second cooldown. Creates **2** visible Sun Strikes within **90**-**180** range of each enemy hero.

name: invoker_forge_spirit_ad
description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.
lore: Culween's Most Cunning Fabrications.
note: Casting this ability will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.

name: invoker_chaos_meteor_ad
description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage and rolling further based on the level. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time.
lore: Tarak's Descent of Fire.
note:
Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every **0.5** seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over **3** seconds.
The meteor moves at a speed of **300**.

name: invoker_ice_wall_ad
description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies and deals damage each second.
lore: Killing Wall of Koryx.
note: The slow will still affect Debuff Immune enemies if their debuff immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.

name: invoker_deafening_blast_ad
description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration then disarm their attacks for a duration.
lore: Buluphont's Aureal Incapacitator.

name: tiny_tree_channel
description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Tree Volley.

name: grimstroke_dark_portrait
description: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is debuff immune, has 95% magic resistance, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
lore: No dark creation is beyond the skill of the master's hand.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Dark Portrait.

name: templar_assassin_trap_teleport
description: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for **2** seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing **400** bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
lore: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Psionic Projection.

name: clinkz_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: clinkz_scepter.

name: slardar_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: slardar_scepter.

name: troll_warlord_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: troll_warlord_scepter.

name: dawnbreaker_fire_wreath
description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
lore: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.
note:
Dawnbreaker travels at a rate of **215** for the duration of the ability and takes a brief **0.2**s to recover after the final strike.
Celestial Hammer or Solar Guardian cannot be cast during the combo.
Cleave does not work with this ability.
Can be self-cast to move forward.
The first two strikes will slow enemy movement speed by **-100%** for **0.12**s.
shard_description: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by **35%** down to a minimum of **215**.

name: dawnbreaker_converge
description: Dawnbreaker recalls her hammer, pulling them together so they meet in the middle.

name: dawnbreaker_solar_guardian
description: CHANNELED - Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within **350** units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.
lore: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.
note:
Pulse interval is **0.5**s.
Total flight duration is **1.7** seconds of channel time + **0.8** of flight time.
Cannot be cast without the Hammer.
scepter_description: Increases Solar Guardian's heal per pulse. Solar Guardian's aura follows Dawnbreaker for **2**s after landing.

name: dawnbreaker_celestial_hammer
description: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for **2** seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.
lore: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.
note:
The hammer damages enemies both when thrown and when returning to Dawnbreaker.
Dawnbreaker's Converge movement distance is capped at the ability's cast range.
Starbreaker cannot be cast while the Hammer is out.

name: dawnbreaker_luminosity
description: After a number of attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within **650** units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for **50%** of the amount.
lore: Diminished in power without access to the Children's replenishing light, Valora can still recharge herself and her allies by creating order from the chaos which resides within each fight.
note:
Luminosity Heal is increased by sources of Lifesteal Amplification.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.

name: special_bonus_unique_tidehunter_8
localized_name: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

name: grimstroke_dark_artistry
description: Grimstroke paints a curved path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits. Applies Ink Trail on hit.
lore: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

name: special_bonus_unique_grimstroke_3
localized_name: +70% Stroke of Fate Speed and Travel Range

name: grimstroke_ink_creature
description:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
lore: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
note:
The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or spell immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.

name: grimstroke_spirit_walk
description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After **3** seconds it applies damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
lore: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.
shard_description:
